programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin follow Nicole to the Rainbow Factory for Bring your Kids to Work Day. They are expecting a magical place full of dreams and wonder but it turns out to be a little less magical than theyd hoped. Despite the fact nobody wants them there, they end up saving the factory from being closed down.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Darwin tries to highlight the plight of all the household objects he feels are being oppressed and maltreated by the uncaring residents of Elmore. He then decides to lead those objects in a revolt against the townspeople.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The boys stay up all night, even though the next day theyre supposed to be babysitting Polly - Pennys little sister. Theyre so tired that they manage to lose Polly in the blink of an eye. They desperately look for her, but find themselves in increasingly weird situations every time they accidently nod off.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nicole has decided its time to throw out the familys refrigerator. This doesnt go down too well with Richard, as its his favorite possession. When it turns out the refrigerator is also a magical storage facility for childhood emotions and memories, it makes sense that Richard is having a hard time letting go.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mr Robinson accidentally lets slip how little he cares for Gumball and Darwin, they react by giving him the cold shoulder. Surprisingly Mr Robinson misses them and tries to win back their friendship. After a few failed attempts, Gumball and Darwin realise that Mr Robinsons heart is protecting him, so they give it an intense affection overload.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Its Halloween in Elmore. As the kids go trick or treating we see what everyone in town is up to. The ghosts and ghouls are finding it increasingly difficult to scare children, and are only scaring part-time. Can Gumball and Darwin help them get their scare back?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumballs old BFF, Fuzzy, turns up on his doorstep. Darwin struggles to accept that there was someone before him and fails to contain his jealousy. But is Darwin right to mistrust Fuzzy? Does Fuzzy actually have sinister motives for reconnecting with his old BFF?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwins clothes go missing after a swimming lesson, and Gumball is forced to wear a tuxedo from the lost and found office. programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When everything goes wrong in Darwins life, he begins to suspect that Gumballs bad influence might be to blame. Darwin decides to go elsewhere for guidance and finds a new mentor in Alan. But maybe its time Darwin started making his own decisions.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin realize that the adult residents of Elmore are dangerously naive when it comes to being safe online. In fact they are in serious need of the boys help with even the simplest of tasks. And no more so than their mom Nicole.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny is being kept awake by a bad case of the hiccups. Half asleep, he guzzles down a midnight drink. Turns out Specs has forgotten sharehouse rule number one: DONT KEEP EXPERIMENTAL LAB CONCOCTIONS IN THE KITCHEN FRIDGE. Skinnys hiccups dont get better. Unless you count "literally turning into a monster every time you hiccup" as "better". No point sitting around shedding on the furniture: Specs puts his newly monsterific buddy to good use as a Lamput-hunter. Which goes well until Skinny gets better. If you count being chased off into the distance by an angry bear as "better".

Actors: Philip Solomon, Phillip Solomon, Michael Croner, Noël Wells, . Director: Eddy Houchins,Martin Ansolabehere,Stu Livingston,.

programme.title: Craig of the Creek
programme.desc: Craig is entrusted with a special anniversary gift for his mom, and immediately loses it in the Creek. / Hoping to help the Creek Daycare, Craig organizes a talent show. Actors: Philip Solomon, Phillip Solomon, Michael Croner, Noël Wells, . Director: Eddy Houchins,Martin Ansolabehere,Stu Livingston,.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Gwen orders a personality modifying ray to tone her perky parents but decides to test it on the client first.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Beth, Duncan and Izzy break Cehefs new VR helmet they have to recreate his game world to keep him from ever finding out the truth.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When a lack of motivation threatens to sink the kids chances in the Sportslete Athlaction Awards, they create the greatest mascot of all time to boost school spirit.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: When Cody gets sick, the kids want send a message back to his home planet in hopes that they can save him, but Courtney is not in favor of this plan.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that its their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin agree to do all of Tobiass chores in exchange for good points! Gumball and Darwin discover that Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns "good points" doing chores for his parents which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his "good points" and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think theyve hit the jackpot. But these "good points" may not be quite as good as Tobias claims...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The new Coach witnesses Jamie bullying the other kids at lunch and steps in. Jamie is made to apologise, much to the amazement of the other kids. Gumball and Darwin worry about Jamie seeking revenge, especially when they see him sneaking into the back of Coachs car. They use their newly acquired gym skills to save the Coach from being bullied.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Sarah the new kid in school is Gumball and Darwins number one slightly obsessive fan. / The new coach at Elmore High stands up to Jamie. / Miss Simian has to save herself from a contagious Joy virus infecting the whole school. / The secret behind Antons immortality. / The kids finally get the puppy they always wanted except its a turtle. / When Mum reveals that Gumballs real name is Zach Gumball adopts a cheesy annoying persona to match the name.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Antons little toasty body disintegrates during a swim class. When Gumball and Darwin see Anton the next day, as good as new, they set out to discover his secret. It turns out that his parents use a special formula to bake new Antons when necessary. So the kids test it out at home and end up baking a clone army whose leader - Ant-one - wants to destroy Anton and take over the world.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: After begging Dad for a puppy, the kids are taken aback when he comes home with a turtle. Despite the fact that the turtle turns out to be extremely aggressive (especially toward Gumball) they try their best to give it the love it deserves. This achieves nothing. The Evil Turtle escapes and goes on a rampage, and they have to find it before it destroys Elmore.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Mom reveals that Gumballs real name is "Zach", Gumball adopts a cheesy, annoying persona to match the name. His family try to make him remember the old Gumball, as this new Zach persona is progressively taking over Gumballs life and erasing his memories. If they cant reach him in time, the old Gumball will disappear forever and theyll be left with Zach!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Nothing much is happening for Gumball and Darwin and the background characters in Elmore seize their moment. An array of diverse characters you may have noticed lurking in the background of Gumball and Darwins adventures finally let their voices be heard. A series of sketches include some tennis crowd extras, two pizzas in love and The Bacon Guy.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is in such a bad mood that it spreads to Darwin, who joins him in complaining about everything. Their constant moaning grabs the attention of the good people of Elmore. Mistaking Gumball and Darwin for genuine kids in need, they put on a benefit and raise money for them. How do Gumball and Darwin confess theres been a mix-up without inciting a riot?!!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The Wattersons are swapping scary stories on a family vacation, when their car breaks down in the middle of the desert. They are left with no alternative but to trust a complete stranger, whose appearance matches the scary guy in Moms story. When the stranger brings them to a derelict gas station, just as he did in moms made-up scary story, the Wattersons can no longer pretend the story isnt coming true.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When Gumball and Darwin discover his diploma is fake, Principal Brown is determined to keep their discovery a secret. He offers them all sorts of "incentives" to keep quiet but the truth is they really dont care whether the diploma is real or not. Mistaking their disinterest as "playing hard to get" Principal Brown resorts to increasingly desperate measures to ensure Gumball and Darin play ball.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin start noticing small details around Elmore High that dont add up. They come to the conclusion that Molly has disappeared, even though nobody else remembers her ever having existed. Mr Small confirms their suspicions and tells them that things are not always what they seem in Elmore. They set off on a quest to rescue Molly in an alternate dimension, and soon need rescuing themselves!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: The students of Elmore Junior High find their world turned upside down when the mysterious school superintendent comes to stamp out their cartoonish ways. But who wants to be normal? Certainly not Gumball and Darwin...

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When we last saw Gumball, he was hitting rewind on Robs Universal Remote, just in time to save himself from being trapped in The Void. The remote has now taken Gumball back to the beginning of that disastrous day. Armed with the knowledge of what this day has in store, he must try and stop Rob from destroying his life.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin go to extreme lengths to help Molly make her dull stories more interesting.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin put Anais new friend -- Josh -- through a series of tests, to see if hes good enough for their sister. However, when the boys extreme methods start freaking Josh out, he questions whether being Anaiss friend is worth the trouble. So Gumball and Darwin end up having to convince Josh to give Anais a second chance.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are convinced its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore in search of adventure, it becomes apparent exciting things are happening just not to them.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Anais has made a new friend, so Gumball and Darwin immediately assume there must be something wrong with him. / Gumball and Darwin think its one of those days when nothing interesting is happening. But as they walk around Elmore it appears exciting things are happening just not to them. / Gumball and Darwin have to stop Alan from becoming Class President of Elmore Junior High. / Nicole remembers the day she first met Richard, and the different choices she could have made.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When a typically stressful Watterson family dinner pushes her to the edge of her sanity, Nicole starts reminiscing about the time she met Richard. Might her life have been better if shed never stopped to talk to her future husband and taken a different path instead?

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: When the Wattersons internet cuts out, they have to adapt to a world without it. / Gumball decides to make some changes when an online personality test tells him that hes "The Loser". / Rocky is trying to find love with the help of the latest dating app… / Gumball and Darwin give Bobert specific instructions to ensure he acts safely. When Bobert starts applying his robot logic to their rules they realise they must be much clearer.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball is livid when an online test keeps telling him that his character-type is "The Loser". Hes convinced that the only way to shake off this label is to do the opposite of everything he normally would. But Gumball suppressing his natural instincts leaves a vacuum, a Gumball-shaped hole that someone has to fill. That someone is Tobias, who starts turning the whole show into a cliched sitcom.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: A chance encounter with the woman of his dreams inspires Rocky to stop living life online and find love with the help of the latest dating app. Gumball and Darwin try to help Rocky through the tricky world of online romance. In the race to find Rockys dream girl they discover that people can forgive almost anything when you tell them youre acting in the name of love.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwins martial arts costumes make them a laughing stock at school.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin are invited to a high school party and have to bring a date!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin unsuccessfully attempt to get a refund for their computer game.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball discovers that Bobert is planning to take over his identity and replace him!

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin barely survive a school picnic in the Forest of Doom.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball sets out to win his Dad back by winning a blindfolded "dumb" race.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball almost loses his mind trying to guess Darwins secret.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs will never learn about watching horror movies before bed. He can never sleep afterwards. He jumps at every strange noise - including the ones Skinnys making downstairs, as he blends up a smoothie IN HIS SLEEP. Skinny sleepwalks into trouble all night, and with Specs gibbering in terror, it falls to Lamput to keep the slumbering nerd out of trouble. Apparently you shouldnt wake sleepwalkers. Turning into a rubber band and flinging them at the moon? Thats fine.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Clayton is a compulsive liar, but Gumball discovers he wasnt lying about his awesome martial arts move. Gumball confronts Clayton about his fabled Seven Pressure Point Heart Exploding Technique, assuming its another one of his outlandish claims. Darwin and Gumball intervene to help Clayton start embracing the truth. However, when they discover the move is as effective as he claimed, they really wish hed been lying.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: The Bad Guy Busters must reunited to save Izzy after Harold uncovers her previous identity and leads a super villain from her past right to her.

programme.title: Total DramaRama
programme.desc: Chef forgets the password for his computer but knows it has something to do with one of the 99 previous explosions that took out the school. Entering the wrong password will cause the school to blow up for the 100th time.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Prince Lionel of England hires The Looney Builders to build him a party room for his birthday, then proceeds to boss the crew around. / Our heroes set off on adventure… on a cruise ship! / Marina gives the pilot a crash course in navigation. / Zig finds a book about African wildlife and realises thats where he actually comes from. He decides to go there and meet his compatriots. / Will Deep-sea diver Barbara bring Bernie back to the surface? / While Grizzy organizes a picnic alongside the pond, the Lemmings steal his jar of Yummy using water balls to discreetly advance underwater. / The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them. / The Bear is preparing to go on a world trip but a last minute accident makes him panic. / Masha is tired of music lessons and she decides she can perform without the tedious learning of notes and goes for a walk with the "Bremen Town Musicians" in fairytale Germany. / A new friend got lost in the forest. Masha acts like a real Robin Hood. She wants to help this lost soul to return home. Meanwhile, the Wolves are trying to get to our guest. / This is a very long car ride! What fun things can we look for out the window that will make the time go faster? / Tom and Jerry mistake burglars loot for a bag of donuts.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Penelope Pussycat to build a fashion runway in France.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Chef Poyung Panda hires The Looney Builders to build her a Dim Sum bus in China. Bugs worries about letting down his favorite chef. / Sharko has a secret dream… he wants to do a water ballet! / Zig befriends a Yeti who helps him get closer to the mermaid… / Marina and Sharko go on holiday… to a campsite. Marina is disappointed: she would have preferred a five-star hotel. Guess who their neighbours are? Zig and Bernie! / Bernie wanders off into an amusement park… / Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. / The Lemmings slide along the Great Wall in a crate. / An unexpected guest whirled Masha and everyone who met on her way in a dance. She made Bear remember his youth and disturbed the calmness of the She-Bear. Who is this stranger? / When we crave for adventures and new experiences, we take sleeping bags and a tent and go camping. We will admire amazing landscapes, climb a mountain and even see real volcanoes! / Masha decides celebrating New Year once is not enough and goes to mysterious China, where dragons dance, gardens bloom and many, many more interesting things are happening! / Its the perfect day to go on a Summer field trip! JJ and friends are having fun with sea animals at the beach. Sing along with us! / A health inspector calls on the Hotel; Tom and Jerry go to a mini-golf park; a swan befriends Jerry; Spike fancies himself a Canine King.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: As The Looney Builders build a giant claw game for Chibi Critters arcade in Japan, they discover the claw part is broken. / Sharko misses the ocean. So when to boat crashes and sinks under the sea hes delighted! / Marina is fascinated by train models. Zig and Bernie turn up with a miniature train that actually works. Marina climbs aboard with Sharko, who bars Zig and Bernie from the trip. / Sharko cant emerge from a recurring pie-in-the-face dream. / How did Bernie end up on the sea floor in the first place? / Grizzy has run out of ideas to open his coconut until he sees the Lemmings new friend the crab open one with a simple snip of the claw. / The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. / Masha tries to comprehend the centuries-old wisdom and sets off in search of enlightenment in the magical land of India, where she will find many new experiences and discoveries. / Somebody terribly scary has climbed into the house of Penguin and made a terrible mess there! / To cure her beloved assistant, Masha goes to a mysterious and amazing eastern country. But the answers to the most difficult questions are simpler than they seem at first glance. / The little ducklings are learning the safe way to cross the street today! Join in and sing along! / Tom has a nightmare about a super-intelligent mouse takeover. Jerry inherits a hamster ball. A chase through NYC turns into a musical tribute.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket becomes annoyingly inconsolable when Scrapper goes missing - calling for him at all hours of the day and night. Bean cant get any sleep! / Mr Bean attempts to retrieve his cash card and "accidently" ends up inside a bank vault. / Mr Bean has to look after an injured Mrs Wicket whose demands start to become a pain. / Mr Bean builds a car washing machine that attracts all manner of customers.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.sub-title: Where Did You Get That Cat?
programme.desc: The animated antics of the hapless bumbler Mr Bean. Mr Bean chases Scrapper around Mrs Wickets flat but her sideboard tumbles over, and when Bean sees a bit of fur poking out from under it, he is horrified to think he has squashed poor Scrapper. Not realising that it is only his landladys furry hat, Bean rushes what he thinks is a flattened cat across town to the vet in a desperate attempt to save his feline friends life.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes a famous internet sensation. / Mr Bean plays gooseberry when Mrs Wicket falls in love with a man Mr Bean doesnt trust. / Mr Bean tries to be romantic but his idea of romance is very different from his girlfriends. / Mrs. Wickets Nephew is staying with her when he wins two tickets to an Outward Bound course. She refuses to go but then ropes in Bean to look after the child.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves Halloween and prepares to give the neighbourhood kids some tricks and treats they wont forget. But when Mr Bean gets carried away with his spooky pranks he becomes the target of even more fiendish tricks from his neighbours the Bruisers.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Seenemikud puuavad valja selgitada, miks nende linn aina kahaneb ja kahaneb.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit teeb katset Mudanupuga sõprust sobitada, aga kas mudakollist uldse on mingit sõpra?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Having rescued a Mushlet, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit becomes heroes in Mushton, and theyre loving it! So Mushlers create a rescue team - but, alas, no one needs saving! How can you be a hero when there is nothing to be heroic about?! Then when some Mushlets become adrift on the river, Team Mush-Mush, with Morels help, have to save the day again.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit kardab, et on oma ande ara rikkunud, ja loodab Tahekubaralt abi saada.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings create a shadow puppet show where seven papercut lemmings confront a bear over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread. The Lemmings in the audience are super enthusiastic, but Grizzy is outraged by the treatment inflicted upon the bear. He decides to intervene and equips the paper bear with an armor and saber! The Lemmings retort with ninja effigies of themselves and mount an attack to recover the coveted jar of Yummy spread.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: As Grizzy relaxes in the massage chair, a cloud drifts in front of the sun, immediately stopping the electricity supply in the log cabin. The voltage drops continue, even though the sky seems clear now. Grizzy looks out the window and a dragon appears on the horizon! Once over his initial fright, the bear realizes that its only a kite flown by the Lemmings - using the electricity from the cabin they have rerouted!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy dismantles the toboggan built by the Lemmings in the log cabin and reemploys the bamboo sticks to build a jacuzzi. When the Lemmings discover the bears piece of work, they imagine a giant waterpark dominated by an immense waterslide. Anticipating the Lemmings desire, Grizzy tries to barricade himself inside but the rodents manage to eject him from the cabin. The bear comes back, protected by a super bamboo armor…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a drone race throughout the cabin. Grizzy, who was on the verge of falling asleep, interrupts the competition but must contend with the rodents reprisals. Thrown out of the cabin, the bear falls onto a temple dedicated to the Monkey King. He appropriates the statues powers, operating a magic cloud by remote control. Grizzy settles in on the cloud and wins the race before the Lemmings. But a cloud that flies that fast can only arouse lust…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: To trick Grizzys vigilance and steal the TV, the Lemmings, disguised as traditional Chinese dancers, perform a number that leaves the bear flabbergasted. The rodents take advantage of their diversion to carry off the TV set on their airborne craft made of Chinese umbrellas. But before they can escape with their bounty, Grizzy recovers the screen. Ever as determined, the Lemmings come back after upgrading their vessel.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Annoyed by a noisy high-speed chase between the Lemmings and a raccoon, Grizzy abruptly stops the game. The players fall into empty space and land in a clearing. The impact of their crash-landing cracks a black and white tile representing Yin and Yang and a strange light pours over the raccoon. Depending on his mood, the color of his fur changes, and his excitement or calm become contagious to all those around him!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: On the way back from a fishing outing, Grizzy unwittingly brings back an electrode that controls a robot. Once activated, the gadget puts itself in the service of the bear, satisfying his each and every need. The envious Lemmings plot to take possession of this new metallic ally. They manage to evict the bear, who does not intend to take this lying down… especially when he discovers a pair of robotic arms hidden in a module that fell out of the robot!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: At nightfall, just as Grizzy starts to doze off, a racket comes from outside the cabin: the Lemmings are sliding along the Great Wall in a crate, propelled by firework rockets. Cleverly avoiding the bears strategies to stop them, the Lemmings accidentally set off a mechanism in a tower. A secret room filled with cannons and catapults opens, just waiting to be used by the powder monkey apprentices…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable… and a bit cocky. Woo, its the new Chep!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mushpot offers to look after the Mushies so Mushpie can get a well-earned rest. He thinks it will be easy. It is not easy! The Mushies end up pushing both Mushpot and Starmush to their limit.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Sushi-Mushis excitement and pride over Chanterelle doing a portrait of him to hang in his restaurant turns to worry. What if his friends dont like it? But, of course, Chanterelle would never let that happen.

programme.title: Meet the Batwheels
programme.desc: After losing one of his wheels on his way to stop Prank, Bam comically attempts to replace his tire with all sorts of zany objects while chasing the prankster van around the city.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Dorothy and friends must find a way through the Wicked Witchs giant blockade in order to make an important delivery to the Emerald City.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: At the annual Broomstorming Sweepstakes, the Wicked Witch and Mean Jeanne the Green will finally settle the score of their 500-year rivalry in the ultimate match-up. But how will Wicked Witch compete without her powers?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Undertakers realm is cluttered with malfunctioning magic from the Wizard, he blames the Wizard and takes the Wizard and Dorothy as his prisoners under the rainbow. Its up to Dorothy and her friends to help the Wizard break them out - using all the Wizards broken magic!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: After Wilhelmina transfers Hungry Tigers appetite to Lyman to help him win a pie-eating contest, Lyman becomes a voracious, uncontrollable eating machine!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Rainbows daughter, Polychrome, falls off the Rainbow and straight into Tin Mans arms, the gang must come up with a plan to reunite her with her father!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky, elastic threads are absolutely perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect. The only problem: he discovers that he has arachnophobia, which is seriously going to complicate the task.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. Indeed, next to the supermarket are two jackpot-style machines with slots the size of the lids. But more importantly, theres a key to be won that makes you eligible for the grand prize... the giant jar of Yummy on display under a glass cover.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy discovers that the true "interference" is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a rave party. When Grizzy throws their stereo into the river he sparks a general power outage. Unless he finds an alternative source of energy and before the Lemmings do he can kiss his TV night goodbye!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When he realises his beloved she-bear adores the smell of flowers, Grizzy decides to offer her the geraniums that decorate the window ledges of the rangers cabin. Can he bring them to her without the Lemmings - who are skating out by the caribou dung pit and rubbish bins - ruining his desired effect?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realises its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean wakes up on a freezing cold winters morning to discover that the boiler is broken and no sign of the repairman. He tries increasingly ridiculous ways to warm up his tea his toothpaste and himself before venturing out to discover somewhere to hunker down and get warm.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Animated series starring the famous cat and mouse duo. Toodles folks are coming for a visit; the problem is that they think shes married with kittens. Tom happily plays the role of husband and volunteers Jerry and Tuffy to play their adorable kittens, but complications ensue when Toodles dad doesnt take to Tom, her mom coddles Jerry and Tuffy a little too much, and Toodles ex-boyfriend Butch learns that his girl got hitched.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Spike recruits Tom and Jerry to help him remove a bad tooth so he can avoid the vet. / Its picture day for Spike and Tom but they both end up dirty and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture. / Rick blames Tom for letting a cricket into the house. He must get rid of it or hell be sleeping outside. / The storm of the century is brewing - at least according to Tuffy and Jerry who are giving a little pay back to Tom for tormenting them earlier. / Rick buys the Suck-Up and at first Tom enjoys the machine using it to clean Jerry out of house! But when the Suck-Up takes over the house Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it. / Little Quaker fears his luck will turn for the worse when he walks under a ladder. When a series of incidents happen to everyone but Little Quaker, he thinks he is to blame. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick buys Ginger a brand new mattress with a lot of high tech features. Tom is under strict orders to never sleep on it but Butch convinces him to try it out. Jerry uses the controls against them and soon that mattress is out of control and destroys the entire house.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom inadvertently set a Yeti loose on the town Jerry Van Mouseling must subdue the beast.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom turns into a Blob monster and proceeds to eat everything in sight, including the village mice.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a "small bump". Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: To escape the clutches of his dastardly pursuers, Lamput leaps onto Skinnys head and poses as a luscious mane of auburn hair. Shouldnt work. Works. Too well; Specs falls head over heels for this new redhead. Skinnys a bit puzzled as to why his bespectacled buddy is acting so weird all of a sudden. The course of true love never runs smooth; nor does the course of a moronic mixup between two annoying nerds. A wigless Skinny "crashes" Specs big fancy date (which, you know, Skinny was invited to) and Specs is very rude indeed about it. Now theyve both got broken hearts. Luckily ice-cream fixes everything.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling insecure about his size after a game of Hide-And-Seek, Buff uses the shrink belt belonging to The Atom and accidentally shrinks himself down to the size of a mouse!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: With Bibi in need of repairs, Batgirl takes Bam out for a spin to stop Mr. Freezes latest icy crime spree. Bam will have to get used to having Batgirl in the drivers seat and learn something new if hes going to help her stop Mr. Freeze!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Her head in the clouds, Alice fails to applaud the Queen when she receives her prize for being the "The Most Wondrous Queen ever!" Threatened with being banished from Wonderland, the girl heads off with Lewis and the Twins to the Land of Hurray to find gifts that will celebrate the Queen like shes never been celebrated before. But unfortunately, discord and negativity cause them to lose the awesome presents theyd picked up so Alice suggests they band together to present the Queen with a very colorful rainbow. Now, all they need to do is find out how to get it out of the sky...

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice gets dizzy while climbing the rope during PE, at school. When she goes to Wonderland and finds Lewis repainting the Queens castle, she keeps her fear of heights hidden. She even suggests a solution for painting the building without climbing it. So when the Queen sends her up to the top of the highest tower, lucky for her that Lewis and Chester are around to save her just in the nick of time! Maybe discussing ones problems with ones friends could be a way of avoiding trouble in the future…?

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: During a picnic in the park, Mel isnt being considerate of the environment around her. Barney transforms the kids into butterflies who can talk to the plants and animals. Mel learns its important to respect and be a caretaker of nature.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Vivie disagrees with her friends about who gets to use a ripe garden tomato, Barney creates space for everyone to share their ideas. Vivie realizes its important to share and they use the tomato to make a pizza everyone can enjoy.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to "irreconcilable differences". For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesnt like change; its like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamputs perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously thats the real enemy.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Jerry leads an accident-prone scouting troop, earning badges and creating mayhem for Tom. / Trouble ensues when Tom is separated from his own shadow. When Toms shadow becomes a total nuisance to both Tom and Jerry, they must team up to shed some light on the problem! / Rick and Ginger are taking care of their "adorable" niece. / Tom is stranded on a deserted island. Its only other living inhabitant is Jerry. Let the survival of the fittest begin! / A magical hat creates mayhem for Tom Jerry and Spike. / When Tom finds Butch having a bath he gives him the boot. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A magical hat creates mayhem for Tom Jerry and Spike. / When Tom finds Butch having a bath he gives him the boot. / After a rough cat and mouse, Jerry quits. Tom is stunned as he watches his friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave. / When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone. / Toms tried everything to get rid of his hiccups. / Tom takes a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After a particularly rough cat and mouse fight, Jerry quits! Tom is stunned as he watches his little friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave. First, Jerry tries moving in next door but thats where Bruno lives. Jerry settles for the house on the other side of his old digs where a rather large, sedentary cat lives. At first, Jerry enjoys his unfettered access to the kitchen but it has its drawbacks: hes constantly having to expand the opening to his new hole because of his weight gain. He first looks to Spike for companionship but that doesnt end well. Then he actively seeks a new mouse-mate, but theres a lot of crazy mice out there, especially one named Mickey. Then Tom and Jerry catch a glimpse of each other through the windows of their adjacent houses. One thing leads to another and the chase thats been happening for decades, continues.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A magical hat creates mayhem for Tom Jerry and Spike. / When Tom finds Butch having a bath he gives him the boot. / After a rough cat and mouse, Jerry quits. Tom is stunned as he watches his friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave. / When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone. / Toms tried everything to get rid of his hiccups. / Tom takes a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After a rough cat and mouse, Jerry quits. Tom is stunned as he watches his friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave. / When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone. / Toms tried everything to get rid of his hiccups. / Tom takes a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out. / Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogres tooth. / Rick accidentally locks Tom and Jerry in the garage. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Rick buys Ginger a brand new mattress with a lot of high tech features. Tom is under strict orders to never sleep on it but Butch convinces him to try it out. Jerry uses the controls against them and soon that mattress is out of control and destroys the entire house.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Night has fallen over the jungle and the solar panels do not generate enough electricity to charge Grizzys TV. When he surprises the Lemmings playing with fireflies that could make his panels work, he catapults the rodents into the distance. The rodents land on a Mayan temple where they discover a magic tiara that can control fireflies. Grizzy, lacking electricity, wants to get the tiara for himself.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After stealing Grizzys jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the Lemmings propel the bear far from the log cabin. Grizzy lands in a temple where he finds a crystal skull which gives you the power to sow discord within a group. Grizzy uses it to set the rodents at odds amongst themselves and takes advantage of the general fight to recover the chocolate spread. But the effects of the magic skull only last a certain time and the ill-feelings cease. The Lemmings unite to give Grizzy a taste of his own medicine!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: While climbing back to the cabin carrying a load of delicious berries, Grizzy trips and falls over backwards. He performs a series of acrobatics worthy of a diving champ and resurfaces safe and sound despite himself. The Lemmings, who saw everything, are in awe and treat Grizzy like an idol. Grizzy starts to enjoy this VIP treatment until the Lemmings ask him to repeat his exploit. Grizzy agrees but discovers that the Lemmings have built a giant diving board for the occasion.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings lose their jar of chocolate spread in a labyrinthian Temple. Determined to recover their favorite afternoon snack, they confront one another in the maze, but end up getting totally lost. Grizzy finds himself back at square one and decides to find something to make holes in the walls and cheat. As for the Lemmings, they discover a magic map of the place that enables you to orient yourself and modify the corridors in real time. Which cheater will win?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Things start to disappear from the log cabin as if by magic. Grizzy is persuaded that the Lemmings are the culprits, but the Lemmings are also victims of inexplicable thefts. As they argue, Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the true authors of the repeated thefts: a gang of fanatic partridges who bring stolen objects as offerings to their goddess, a giant partridge. Grizzy and Lemmings join forces to infiltrate the nest and recover their belongings.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A frog swallows an ancestral jewel that bestows it with the power of mind control. Grizzy uses the frog to swallow the flies that have proliferated in the cabin, and which now let themselves be docilely caught. The Lemmings dont miss a thing. They decide to get hold of the frog to hypnotize an uncooperative tapir who refuses to play rodeo. Grizzy hypnotizes the Lemmings, who become his servants. But several Lemmings escaped and are preparing a rescue mission.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Turns out constant, relentless failure can put a strain on a relationship. Specs and Skinny are no exception, and when yet another chase ends in embarrassment, misfortune, and physical injury, the Docs finally fall prey to "irreconcilable differences". For a shapechanger, Lamput sure doesnt like change; its like mum and dad are fighting. Lamput sets about trying to help the Docs patch things up. When conventional methods fail, our orange buddy is forced to subvert the very fundamentals of animated storytelling. Lamputs perseverance finally pays off. The Docs have an epiphany: this blob trying to fix our friendship? Obviously thats the real enemy.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean loves playing in the neighbourhood soft play centre - bouncing on the trampolines whizzing down the slides and most of all immersing himself in the ball pool. But he doesnt like sharing the place with all those annoying kids. So Bean decides to turn his flat into his own private play area where he can play in peace. Unfortunately Irma Mrs Wicket and The Bruisers all want to join in the fun with him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean orders a takeaway pizza but when it arrives he feels let down by the size of it. So he sets out to bake his own unique Teddy shaped pizzas. Under the name Pizza Bean his pizzas become extremely popular and very soon business in booming. As a result rival pizza producer Don Crustyoni sees his profits plummeting and decides to make Mr Bean an offer he cant refuse.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is not allowed to fly off on holiday as his passport has no photograph. After failing to get one from a photo booth he tries numerous other ways to get his photo taken including photobombing a tourists snap. None of these work but after Bean is arrested maybe the police can assist him. Say cheese!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean wants to impress Irma by entering them both into a dance competition at the local park. But his tango is terrible and his rumba ridiculous so he enrols for lessons at a local dance school. After an unsuccessful class at the dance studio and a trip to the library to teach himself Mr Bean has lost track of time. He needs to make it up to a disgruntled Irma but will his homemade effort "win" her over.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput takes refuge in a fancy hotel. Specs and Skinny bluff their way past the doorman by acting like they come from the expensive side of the tracks. Spoiler: they dont. The honeymoon suite is like nothing theyve ever seen; the Docs sheen of respectability quickly evaporates when theres robes to wear and beds to jump on. Their taste of the good life doesnt last long, though; another Lamput chase results in a proper trashed hotel room, just like you read about. Then downstairs for some à la carte chaos in the hotel restaurant. Its bad news for the Docs when the tab comes due; a Lab wage wont cover these extras.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels in a bad mood, she has a hard time finding the "happy" in anything. Barneys magical scavenger hunt leads Mel to discover that searching for and focusing on things youre grateful for can make you feel better.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Mel is on a quest to find a special treasure and accidentally makes a big mess in the park. Barney creates a magical adventure where Mel learns its important to clean up and care for a place thats special to you and your community.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, hell have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Today, Queen has decided to commission a unique dress from her talented Seamstress Card: she wants it made out of wild thread - a very difficult one to tame! And should her Seamstress Card fail to pull it off, she will be relieved of her duties on the spot! Alice and Lewis jump to it, coming up with all kinds of bright ideas to help out the poor card. As a result, in the end, a whole cat walk of dresses awaits the Queen!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice and Lewis make a "snow-woman" in the Queens likeness. But, miffed at not bearing a very strong resemblance to the original, she heads off to meet her model. Our two heroes are scared: their mockery is about to be discovered! But surprise surprise!: the Queen is anything but offended! In fact, she takes the snow-woman under her wing, even going so far as to appoint her her deputy! Unfortunately for Alice and Lewis, this icy substitute becomes just as moody as the Queen: now theyre going to have to do all they can to remind her who she truly is!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: For a blob of goo, Lamput sure has a big heart; the orange softie really cant sleep until the little spider nearby has help building its web. Good deeds go a long way, too - when a swarm of nasty mosquitos decides to prey upon the sleeping Lamput, the little spider goes above and beyond to protect its new orange bestie. The spider wins in the end, although theres a bit of a close call at one stage. Why did Lamput decide to go to bed right next to a thousand foot drop to certain doom? We may never know.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: In Catsylvania, the peasant mice oompah band plays onstage at the auditorium. As the bandleaders lovely daughter, Gretta, hits a high note in her rousing song, Tom—in a mask and hood—swings in on a rope and abducts her. Van Mouseling and the peasant band chase him through the rafters and backstage, but Tom escapes with his captive to a subterranean lair. Will the mice manage to free Gretta?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After Tom drifts off to sleep, a tumbleweed blows into his face, and he discovers that the kitchen looks like an old west saloon. The bartender, Spike, and customers recognize him as the Catnip Kid. Then he sees himself in the mirror—dressed like a gunslinger, a silver-plated pea shooter holstered to his hip! Will Sherriff Jerry bring him to justice in this western adventure?

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland until they realize they cant get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs and Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Safety standards at the Docs Lab remain shockingly low. Once, just once, it would be nice to invent something that doesnt then get out of hand and backfire, causing widespread chaos. Well, this shrink ray aint it. At first it works great (which is typical). Lamput is caught in a tiny vial, and the Docs are riding high on the triumph. Then they go over a small bump. Their risk management plan doesnt account for a "small bump". Before long Lamput and Skinny are engaged in a high speed chase through the Boss moustache. Seriously. Someone should just shrink this Lab right out of existence. No, wait, that happens too.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Conned by a mechanic into believing his beloved car to be beyond repair, Mr. Bean reluctantly consigns his faithful four-wheeled friend to the car crusher. After choosing hot-air ballooning as an alternative mode of transport, he spots his cherished car from the air… with the unscrupulous mechanic whistling at the wheel! This discovery raises more than Mr. Beans spirits.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Beans Birthday dinner gets off on the wrong foot when he and Teddy are made to take the worst table at a swanky restaurant. The evening is further ruined by a self-obsessed movie star at the next table. After a swim in the lobster tank, Mr. Bean unwittingly cooks up sweet revenge in the kitchen.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: During a visit to Londons National Gallery, Bean witnesses the theft of a major work of art. Bloodhound that he is, he pursues the culprit across the Channel to Paris only to be waylaid by a Reliant Robin, a traffic jam, and a mime artist under the Eiffel Tower. Will Mr Bean "the International Art Sleuth" prove successful?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput masquerades as a swimming trophy at the local pool, Skinny finds himself in his red trunks, warming up for the big race. Youd be surprised at how fast a Doc can swim when theres a Lamput up for grabs. Skinny discovers skills not even he was aware of. Shame the trophies keep switching places. No lap-time in the world can outsmart this little orange blob.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover a super-secret Canadian Army prototype which resembles a simple computer keyboard. It has only several command keys: select, cut and paste, and delete, but the keys act directly on surrounding elements... as well as on living beings!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After the rains, to the great delight of the Lemmings, strange bouncing mushrooms have sprouted in the yard. To put an end to the Lemmings noisy games - which prevent Grizzy from enjoying his peace and quiet - Grizzy tramples the mushrooms. Only to realize that each crushed mushroom frees a cloud of spores that instantly creates… a bunch of identical mushrooms.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have laid hand on special magnets which turn any object they are stuck to into flying objects. Grizzy bears the consequences and is ejected out of the cabin on his couch, which has turned into a flying-couch. Upon landing, Grizzy discovers by chance that the magnet stuck to his forehead enables him to fly like Peter Pan.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: With a lion-tamers whip, a sugar bowl and lots of work, the Lemmings have successfully trained a caribou to go through their obstacle course. Grizzy cannot help but admire the performance. He decides to steal their idea, and the caribou, to create his own circus act and impress his lovely she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy happens onto the electronic version of the "Ranger Lemming" toy which is capable of reproducing the movements one teaches it, like a smart robot. Grizzy immediately grasps the potential of a robot that could perform chores with rapidity and precision, but the Lemmings would rather teach it to dance.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is locked in a department store overnight and has the time of his life. / Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be? / Mr Bean crashes his mini into a pool of slurry and is desperate to get himself and his car clean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips in a competition to win goodies. Indeed, next to the supermarket are two jackpot-style machines with slots the size of the lids. But more importantly, theres a key to be won that makes you eligible for the grand prize... the giant jar of Yummy on display under a glass cover.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy discovers that the true "interference" is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a rave party. When Grizzy throws their stereo into the river he sparks a general power outage. Unless he finds an alternative source of energy and before the Lemmings do he can kiss his TV night goodbye!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When he realises his beloved she-bear adores the smell of flowers, Grizzy decides to offer her the geraniums that decorate the window ledges of the rangers cabin. Can he bring them to her without the Lemmings - who are skating out by the caribou dung pit and rubbish bins - ruining his desired effect?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Decidedly, this is not Grizzys day: after making a fool of himself in front of the she-bear hes in love with, he is ousted from the log cabin by the Lemmings, who are in top form. Grizzy lands in a field of clover where he notices that one of the plants - with four leaves - seems to bring him good luck. Could his fortunes be changing?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy cant believe his eyes when he sees objects moving all by themselves. When he realises its the Lemmings who are playing around with a particularly powerful magnet, he has a stroke of genius. He will design a telekinesis trick to impress his beloved she-bear.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Further to a misunderstanding, Grizzy is persuaded that the she-bear hes in love with has been turned into a frog. While he looks through the rangers books of fairy tales, searching for a means to return his beloved to her original form, the Lemmings try to recover the frog, with whom they have so much fun playing rodeo games.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers a baby raccoon not far from the log cabin. When he sees its big, moist eyes, Grizzy melts and adopts the creature. When the Lemmings drag the baby into their dangerous games, the overprotective Grizzy steps in, provoking even more perilous situations!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput masquerades as a swimming trophy at the local pool, Skinny finds himself in his red trunks, warming up for the big race. Youd be surprised at how fast a Doc can swim when theres a Lamput up for grabs. Skinny discovers skills not even he was aware of. Shame the trophies keep switching places. No lap-time in the world can outsmart this little orange blob.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. The Batwheels zoom into action when the Legion of Zoom plan to cheat their way to winning the Gotham Grand Prix.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. Batwing is so happy to have another flying vehicle around when Green Arrow and his Arrowplane Goldie come to help Batman take on Riddler.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Kitty the Catmobile saves Bam when hes in a tight spot, Bam decides to take her on a ride along patrol in the hopes of recruiting her.

programme.title: Batwheels
