When Bibi wishes that she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, she decides to only focus on having fun instead.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders rush to build a soccer stadium in Mexico for their fast customer, Speedy Gonzalez. / Marina makes a documentary about the North Pole with Sharko. / Marina fantasizes about winter sports. Sharko transforms the volcano into a ski resort. Zig is delighted: this is an incredible opportunity! / Sharko and Marina want to perform as a figure skating duo. / Will Bernie stop at nothing to win the talent contest? / Before an audience of penguins and walruses, two teams of Lemmings perform acrobatic high jumps, competing for the winning prize. / The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance. / It is interesting to know how your favorite characters will behave if you find yourself in the wild West. Who will be a sheriff, who is a robber, and who is a fighter for justice? / On a nice summers day Bear, as usual, goes fishing and Masha follows alongside. But the fishing trip didnt quite work out. / When its winter and cold outside, hot drinks arent the only ones who can warm you up. Take a trip into hot memories of Mexico. Masha and the Bear arent afraid of cold weather. / Its summer! Lets go to the beach! Its time for some fun under the sun! / Tom is to keep a chimp away from bananas; Tom takes Spikes place in a dog contest; A musical frolic in the snow; Toots is determined to catch Jerry.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Easter Bunny is sick, so she hires The Looney Builders to take over the festivities and ensure Looneyburg has a great Easter.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders help Wile E. Coyote build a telescope to view the Looney Moon, Tweety must face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is painting a picture of Teddy when he accidently squirts some green paint onto his brown wallpaper. Oh no! Bean needs to redecorate his room fast but ends up painting all the walls a garish lime green instead of brown. Hes so terrified of Mrs Wicket finding out that when he goes to bed he has some very weird nightmares - with a rather sickly ending.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is no fan of wrestling. But hes promised to take Mrs Wicket and her friend Mrs Wince to a big wrestling match in town. Bean finds himself lost backstage at the stadium and accidentally wanders through a door and straight into the wrestling ring where he finds himself up against Side Kick Rick. More by luck than talent Bean wins the match - only to find that now he has to fight the terrifying Bruise Force.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean needs to see a very rare bird so he can tick off every page in his bird-spotting book. But he soon gets bored as he waits in a hide for the rare bird to appear. Instead he goes home and paints a picture of the bird cuts it out and sticks it high up a tree in the back garden. Soon he is besieged by excited twitchers who think it really is the rare bird. They are all keen to get a snap and theyre willing to pay good money for a peek.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean finds himself babysitting a baboon.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mikk-Mikk ja sõbrad on sunnitud Torikut ning Tatikut võõrustama.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Lilit korraldab kontserdi, et Mampel saaks seenerahvale esineda, aga siis selgub, et Mampli haal pole just kiita...

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Seekord lahevad seenesellid koos Seenepapiga aardejahile.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Tana uritab Mikk-Mikk Kubaralinna elanikele tulevikku ennustada.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread in the cabin and it ends up sinking in the lagoon. The bear makes a diving suit from various home facilities, while the Lemmings share a diving tank to put a wrench in their adversarys flippers! But the local wildlife comes to meet them…

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up after a nap, starving, but the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread is empty. The cupboards are barren, except for a package of chocolate powder. Grizzy has the idea of mixing it with coconut milk. Its absolutely delicious! But the Lemmings, who are every bit as gluttonous, want their share of the choco-coco drink!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy gets a nice big bite on the end of his fishing line. While he concentrates hard to strike his catch, the Lemmings divert the fish to tow them on a kite. Grizzy tries to sabotage their improvised kitesurfing game to recover whats rightfully his, until a sharks fin appears on the horizon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The cupboards of the log cabin are hopelessly empty and Grizzys belly is rumbling. Through his binoculars, he observes the overexcited Lemmings slipping all sorts of small metal objects into the slot of… a Yummy vending machine!?! The bear joins them on the pontoon. If only they could find some coins to make the machine work. Maybe the solution is to find the booty indicated on the treasure map they unearthed on the beach?

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After accidentally breaking his favorite sofa, Grizzy spots a cozy fishing cabin on a neighboring island. He requisitions the Lemmings canoe to get there but discovers that the new cabin is dilapidated and lacking all comfort. The poor bear had been deluded by a poster. However, a fabulous yacht is moored nearby. It catches both his attention and that of the Lemmings, who have just disembarked on the island!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun taking potshots at sand statues depicting Grizzy. Outraged, he catapults them far into the distance. Grizzy takes advantage of their absence to erect a monumental sculpture of himself. But just as he takes a selfie in front of the sculpture, Grizzy realizes that the Lemmings have laid hands on… a pirate cannon!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: After being hit over the head, the Lemmings become hypnotized by a fitness poster and take themselves for sports coaches. They are determined to forcefully train Grizzy, who would much rather lounge around than do push-ups and squats. But the Lemmings new personality makes them particularly overbearing.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Nothing seems to be biting Grizzys fishing rod and the bear is in despair. Suddenly he spots a fabulous swordfish swimming in the lagoon. The bear is already licking his chops, when he sees the Lemmings straddling the fish in a rodeo game. From inside the cabin he uses as a mooring post, Grizzy manages to snare the swordfish and is about to pull it in, but the Lemmings are riding it toward the high seas. Each party tugs hard. And the cabin starts to slide…

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Wanting to show the Mushies that they should fly high and follow their dreams, Mushpie starts leaf-gliding for the first time. But soon she is flying way too high!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Puff wants to impress Sushi-Mushi by showing him how he can use his fog to steam food. But Sushi-Mushi thinks Puff wants to be his cooking rival!

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and Lilit discover that each of them has a favourite beetle. This is great! Theyre beetle buddies! However this quickly turns into a competition on who has the "best" beetle...

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: Having learnt that Starmush overcame his fear of the Dark Forest by staying a night there when he was a Mushler, Mush-Mush and Lilit convince Chep that they should do the same. But will they end up fearless or fearful?

programme.title: Mikk-Mikk ja seenerahvas
programme.desc: The Mushlers home-tree isnt big enough to store all of Cheps collections. So Chep goes all around Mushton to find a new home for them - and no way hes letting them move out without him!

programme.desc: Batman discusses the Batmobiles amazing capabilities and features during an interview at Gothams auto show.

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: When the Wicked Witch uses a new wand to suck her magic out of the Wizard, the magic morphs into a Magical Mist Monster and runs off. Now the race is on to chase down the monster and finally get her magic back!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Ojo thinks his luck has finally changed when he finds a treasure map that he hopes will lead him to fame, fortune and riches!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Tired of being treated as a "seedy character" by the people of Oz, Jack Pumpkinhead has the Wizard turn his head into something a little more fun: a pineapple. Jack loves the new look and even gets a girl in the process. But when the spell goes wrong, Jack blames the Wizard, not realizing that Jane Watermelonhead has a secret of her own!

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz
programme.desc: Woozy has been led astray and lost. His doppelganger is a Nome King powered Trojan Horse. Who would have thought Ozma would love him just the same?

programme.title: Dorothy and the Wizard of Oz

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy builds a look-alike robot to keep the Lemmings away while he prepares a popcorn party for his beloved she-bear. But his doubles artificial intelligence truly leaves a lot to be desired. If only it were as clever as the original...

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: When she is accidentally hit over the head, Grizzys beloved she-bear thinks shes a Lemming. Grizzy thinks that another little well-placed bang over the head will knock her ideas back into place. The only problem is that the Lemmings, who are delighted to have a new playmate, have no intention of letting him proceed with his plan.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Irma wants a romantic break; Bean doesnt. Its too expensive. Irma kidnaps Teddy and refuses to give him back unless Bean promises to take her to Paris. Caught between his inability to pay and his love of Teddy Bean doesnt know what to do! Until he spots a cat beauty competition in which first prize is a romantic break in Paris - if only he can catch Scrapper …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean wants to avoid lunch with Irmas Mum at all costs. He persuades Mrs. Wicket to let him join her on a coach trip to a concert - but he has to disguise himself as an old-aged pensioner or he wont be allowed on the coach. Once on the coach Bean drives everyone mad with his anti-boredom antics.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is showing Irma his favourite tree in the park one day when he discovers a tree surgeon getting ready to cut it down. He darts up the tree and wont come back down. Irma loves this new side of Bean-ey! The tree surgeon is frustrated and tries various ploys to get Bean down. But can Bean make it to the toilet without being discovered and still save that tree?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket is persuaded by a jaunty estate agent to put her house up for sale. Bean is distraught - where will he live? Not Mrs. Wickets problem. Bean decides to hi-jack the sales process in order to deter all potential buyers - even if it means turning the whole house upside down!

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Its Spikes birthday, but Rick has forgotten about it. Tom and Jerry work together to give the pooch a birthday to remember, but unfortunately their every effort backfires. / Hi-jinx ensue when Jerry decides to mock-up a "REWARD IF FOUND" poster with Toms picture on it and listing the address of the neighbour with the ferocious dog as Toms home... / Tom finds himself in a series of unfortunate events. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: When Tom makes a deal with a magician, they go to town as they perform a show.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: The neighbors cat turns out to be a hipster whos laid back attitudes and behaviors are soon adopted by Tom and the other alley cats. Annoyed Jerry decides to put an end to all of their silly nonsense.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom falls into a manhole and finds a magic cloak that turns him into King of the Catacombs.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Tuzki is back as the new intern at the lab. Specs and Skinny has a task for him but Tuzki gets completely lost. Lo and behold, Lamput is just around the corner to help Tuzki complete his mission which is to capture Lamput! Now Tuzki has to return the favour but how will he answer to his bosses?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs and Lamput are accidentally taken onboard an alien spaceship! Before the aliens start experimenting on them, they have to find a way to escape. Thank goodness, Skinny and Boss come to the rescue but Specs and Lamput to figure out how to use an alien teleporter. Will they be able to do it before the aliens find them?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs cant keep up with Lamput and he manages to escape them at every move. Inspired by the animals at a local zoo, the Docs build a machine to harness the animal prowess. Maybe now they can be as fast as a cheetah and outrun Lamput!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Redbird struggles to stop Poison Ivys diabolical schemes because he wants to be in the spotlight. But when he needs to use the bat-o-flage and become invisible, hell have to learn that doing good is its own reward.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. After snagging an ultra-fuel cell upgrade, Penguins Ducky Boat suddenly becomes the fastest vehicle in Gotham - confident leader Bam must now rally the Batwheels to stop the turbo Ducky.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice catches fleas from her cat Echo! Her dad wants to treat them with lemon juice but the little girl takes off to Wonderland to ask Lewis for an alternative remedy. Unfortunately, in the process, she passes the fleas over to Lewis! In Wonderland, fleas dont make you itch; they make you jump super high! Not a huge problem per se, except, when the Queen sees Alice and Lewis "boinging" up in the sky, she wants to punish them for out-jumping her! Quick!: Alice and Lewis must get rid of their fleas before the Queen catches them!

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: Alice blames her cat for some minor mischief in order to get herself off the hook. Then she heads off to Wonderland to try and find a solution: she doesnt want Echo to be punished for her wrongdoing. While shes there, she finds herself playing detective with Lewis: they must find the mysterious individual who took and bashed up the royal carriage then abandoned it. Besides discovering the persons identity, Alice also finds out that, when youve goofed, the best thing is to just admit it - simple!

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Mels in a bad mood, she has a hard time finding the "happy" in anything. Barneys magical scavenger hunt leads Mel to discover that searching for and focusing on things youre grateful for can make you feel better.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Inspired by a hot-rod in Mels dads garage, Barney helps the kids make their own magical hot rod-style race cars! When Mel gets frustrated that she keeps losing the race, Barney helps her realize theres more to racing than just winning.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: A little cat and mouse ends with Tom taking a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out. After a little first aid, Tom wakes up as a kung-fu master. Now Jerry, Tuffy and Spike must reverse whatever happened to Tom to make him so lethal, otherwise theyll live the rest of their lives getting Tom-Fud. Only problem? No one can get near him.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After a rough cat and mouse, Jerry quits. Tom is stunned as he watches his friend storm off to his hole, pack up his belongings and leave. / When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone. / Toms tried everything to get rid of his hiccups. / Tom takes a shot to the kisser that knocks the cat out. / Hildie and Beatie bring home a magic ogres tooth. / Rick accidentally locks Tom and Jerry in the garage. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: After accidentally locking Tom and Jerry in the garage, an exhausted Rick reports that hes finished organising the garage for the big yard sale in the morning. Better get to bed because theyve got to get up bright and early! When Spike realises Tykes first collar (the one he had as a wee-pup) was tossed in a box of pet items to be sold, he recruits Tom and Jerry to help him get it back. They successfully return the collar to Spike, but not before being locked in the garage for the night and doing battle using every yard sale toy, gadget and yard tool at their disposal to survive each other.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / When Spikes poker-playing pals go missing, he hires the cat and mouse detectives to find out where theyve gone. / Tom and Jerry cant sleep because of incessant barking. / When Spikes poker playing pals go missing he hires the cat and mouse detective to find out where theyve gone. / Hildie is mixing a batch of foot balm for her feet. / Tom is getting married to Toodles in a backyard wedding. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom gets a can of Cat Cop a spray that creates a tiny cop. / Tom and Jerry get into a garden growing contest that turns out badly for Tom. / Tom has planned an afternoon rendezvous with Toodles. / An overly ambitious young house sitter ruins Toms plans. / Hildies received another dozen roses from her admirer. / A travelling cat "salesman" sells Tom just what he needs. Director: Darrell Van Citters,.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry get a taste of the great outdoors on their camping trip to Yosemite.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: A military convoy has an accident while transporting top-secret material. In the impact, a technological sphere flies out and rolls over to Grizzy, who was gathering berries in the forest. Grizzy realizes that the sphere is a sort of compass that indicates the direction of his desires. He follows it and finds a bush overflowing with his favorite berries. The Lemmings recover the compass to find super game sites in the forest.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a hand-shaped scepter ornated with a gold nugget that covers anything it touches with gold. Grizzy uses the object to "gold leaf" the Lemmings and swipe their chocolate bar. The Lemmings use their golden casts as armors to recover their chocolate. During the combat, the gold nugget is replaced by a chocolate one: the scepter now coats everything with chocolate. The Lemmings snatch it and flee.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize a dance contest where the first prize is a jar of chocolate spread. Grizzy is hungry and decides to participate. He partners up with a talented dancing parrot and wins. Incapable of sharing, Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the prize. The parrot brings the jar to a temple devoted to the glory of dancing parrots. To get it back, Grizzy and the Lemmings must perform a choreography. They decide to rehearse together.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange creature fossilized in amber resin that resembles him. A natural science encyclopedia confirms that its his ancestor. Grizzy wants to take the block of amber, but the Lemmings fight him for it because the blue animal with big teeth is their ancestor too. The block cracks during their fight and frees the ancestor who turns out to be a rather unmanageable burden.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings find a strange card game representing the elements along with instructions. The idea is to pretend that the ground is on fire or of ice, like in the game "Floor is Lava." They transform the cabin into a giant adventure trail. Depending on the card drawn, they must avoid zones on the floor with flames or wax. Grizzy unceremoniously gets rids of the setup to regain control of the cabin. One of the cards lands on a stone slab that transforms into lava. The Lemmings are delighted: they will be able to play "for real"!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings discover a very particular cocoa tree with chocolate-spread sap! Reduced to eating canned Brussels sprouts, the only remaining food in the cabin, Grizzy is baffled when he sees the Lemmings parading past to equip themselves with all sorts of containers: ladles, soup spoons, bowls, buckets, basins, etc. He watches them through binoculars and discovers that they have planted a faucet in a tree where chocolate spread flows. Grizzy decides to siphon off their tree.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs go out en masse to catch Lamput, there is a mishap with a bucket of grey paint, and no-one notices the extra Doc on the van-ride back to the Lab. Lamput-in-disguise is overwhelmed by the scale of the Labs operations - but soon enough proves to be pretty sharp at this Doc business. To catch a Lamput, youve gotta think like a Lamput, see. Lamputs so good at science-ing that soon enough poor old Specs and Skinny are sacked with extreme prejudice. Lamput cant stand watching his old buddies kicked out on the street. If only folks would believe the newest Doc: under this grey exterior, there beats a heart as orange as orange can be.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. He is forced to dress up as Mrs. Wicket when Brian the Delivery Man wont deliver the chair to anyone but Mrs. Wicket. Then Brian falls in love with "her" and asks "her" out on a date. Bean accepts because hes starving hungry. How long can he keep up the deception? Long enough to fill his stomach?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Animation based on the highly popular live action series of the same name, with many of the same characters including the hapless Mr. Bean himself, his long-suffering girlfriend Irma Gobb, Teddy and the mysterious driver of the Reliant Supervan. Two new characters appear, Beans landlady Mrs Wicket and her evil one-eyed moggy Scrapper. The series features little actual dialogue, just the famous mumblings and mild slapstick.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. / Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair. / Mr Bean dog sits for Irma and gets the idea for a new dog-walking business - how hard can it be? / Mr Bean crashes his mini into a pool of slurry and is desperate to get himself and his car clean.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Its Irmas birthday. Bean buys a bargain-bin load of cards, and writes out two - one nice, one silly. He gets his envelopes mixed up and sends off the wrong card. He tries to persuade the postman to hand the card back, but no luck. He winds up causing chaos at the sorting office in a last-ditch attempt to avoid Irmas ire.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean breaks his bed using it as a trampoline. He tries to fix it, but he cant. Next morning, and after an awful nights sleep, he goes to buy a brand-new bed. He has fun trying all the beds out, but the one he wants is too expensive. He is about to get thrown out of the shop when he turns his experience of all the beds to his advantage.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean drives her and Miss Wince to their booked spa retreat; and wait outside in the car until theyre done. Bean gets bored, so bored that he decides to sneak into the spa and get Mrs. Wicket and Miss Wince out. Chased by the irate Receptionist, Bean gets more than he bargained for when he crashes into Mrs. Wickets massage session.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs chase Lamput into the darkest jungle, where they have a go at the literal oldest trick in the book: a covered pit trap. Why these guys think this will work is anyones guess. Meanwhile Lamputs facing a whole different challenge: a lost baby elephant is looking for her mama, and seems to have a knack for getting in all kinds of trouble along the way. Lamput and the baby elephant do eventually find the mama pachyderm - with help from the Docs. And their stupid pit trap. Yet again these guys have caught more than they bargained for.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: Davids feeling too quiet to play heroes the same way as Mel and Vivie. Barney helps Mel and Vivie recognize that theres value in all different styles of play and Davids chosen power of quiet observation ends up saving the day.

programme.title: Barneys World
programme.desc: When Vivie disagrees with her friends about who gets to use a ripe garden tomato, Barney creates space for everyone to share their ideas. Vivie realizes its important to share and they use the tomato to make a pizza everyone can enjoy.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Buff tries to show Batwing how great it is to volunteer to help Gothams needy, but the Legion of Zoom get in the way.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Animated adventure series for younger viewers that follows a team of five superpowered vehicles - Bam, Redbird, Bibi, Batwing and Buff - as they are thrust into hijinks and action while learning important lessons about teamwork, friendship, and so much more helping Batman, Robin and Batgirl defend Gotham City. When Bibi wishes that she could live a rule-free life like Jestah, she decides to only focus on having fun instead.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: While delivering a yummy stew to the Queen, Alice and Lewis notice the moon is crying and that its falling tears are flooding the castle! Afraid her royal residence is about to collapse any minute, Queen orders Alice and Lewis to find a solution to this problem on the double! And so off they go to the moon, where a whole plethora of surprises awaits them.

programme.title: Alice and Lewis
programme.desc: What a disaster!: the Queens favorite booties have gone missing! And if Alice and Lewis dont find them, theyre going to have to shine all fifty-thirteen other pairs of shoes in her majestys possession! Hot on the heels of the mischievous boots, our two heroes must use clever tactics to persuade them to get back to the Queens feet!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs are so obsessed with catching Lamput that even in their dreams, the chase goes on. Its really not a restful sleep, when you keep waking up sweating from horrid visions that, lets face it, just remind you what a nightmare your day job is. The Docs make the brave decision to see a therapist about these terrible dreams. In the waiting room is the last orange blob they wanted to see; apparently a life of hot pursuit is taking its toll on Lamput, too. The shrink will have to resort to some very unconventional treatments.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Mice visitors from Mars force Tom to change the way he treats Jerry.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are hired to find a missing priceless Maltese Pigeon.

programme.title: Tom ja Jerry
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland until they realize they cant get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Mr. Moustache is on a romantic date with Miss Lipstick during Loi Krathong festival (the famous annual Thailands light festival), an event that nothing must go wrong! However, the Docs and their chase with Lamput keeps getting in the way of the the lovers perfect night out.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: After a beautiful start to a beautiful day, a sudden storm cuts the fun short and the Docs have to go home. Lamput accidentally gets taken home with them. As always, Lamput makes himself at home. No one is the wiser until the next morning. Its time for Skinny and Specs to go into full on detective mode and to find out who or what is in their house. Can Lamput make a run for it before they find him?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pursuing Lamput is a dastardly career, but theres a right and a wrong way to go about it. Doc Specs cuts corners, showing up at the Lab with a fake Lamput made out of a jar of marmalade and a couple ping pong balls - a Jamposter! Specs relishes his new role as hero of the day, but his best friend Skinny smells a rat. As does Lamput, who is patently NOT captured. Not to mention a battalion of ants who dont care at all about Specs professional fortunes. Specs plan has a serious use-by date. Lucky Skinny can forgive. As a friend, hes the real deal.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Whos afraid of daft films about giant killer cats, blobs from outer space and thumb-size men who dance around in sugar bowls? Mr. Bean is. Hes very afraid. A trip to the cinema makes Mr. Beans imagination play tricks on him.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Against his better judgement, Bean has agreed to go out on a proper date with Irma Gobb, his girlfriend. She has the perfect evening planned: a romantic film followed by a candlelit dinner for two. If only she had the perfect boyfriend to go with it.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mistaken for an escaped convict, Bean is carted off to jail where he finds that, with a little imagination, prison can be quite nice actually. The real convict finds life less cosy under the thumb of Mr. Beans landlady.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean finds himself dogged by a young Japanese boy at the Science Museum. He takes an instant dislike to the Scallywag until he sees what the kid has in his backpack: gadgets so cool you cant even get them in the West. So when a security guard tries to ruin their fun they run away together to... Mars!

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Rangers cabin is equipped with an ultra-effective pest detector capable of sensing the presence of an intruder then chasing it out by emitting a wave that instructs the creatures brain to leave at once. Grizzy and the Lemmings are no longer able to stay inside until they discover that the boxs remote-control device allows you to select which type of animal will be spared or targeted by the wave.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Grizzy finds himself unwillingly caught up in a race between two teams of Lemmings. When he understands the stakes, he tries to win but loses. Grizzy has his pride: he wants a return match. He decides to build his own racing machine to challenge the Lemmings soapbox.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have placed giant remote-controlled hydraulic jacks under the cabin to transform it into a life-sized rolling ball game. Grizzy who in inclined to seasickness tries to put things back in place. The cabin tips over into empty space.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: The Lemmings have unearthed a crate of competition boomerangs. They rapidly become pros capable of disarming Grizzy at a distance and ejecting him from the cabin with disconcerting ease. To compete with the precision of the Lemming boomerangs, Grizzy decides to learn archery and becomes the Canadian William Tell.

programme.title: Grizzy ja lemmingud
programme.desc: Exasperated by the Lemmings who prevent him from watching his favorite TV show in peace, Grizzy catapults them out of the cabin. One of them passes through the northern lights and undergoes a strange mutation: he now has the power to control metal with his mind.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. But never one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed …

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean is trying to impress some kids in the park with his football skills but winds up kicking their ball into a dilapidated, scary-looking house. He has to go in and get it back. A feral cat living inside decides to steal Teddy, and in the chase around the insides of the house Bean manages something not even a wrecking ball can do.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr. Bean accidentally spills all of Mrs. Wickets new, expensive perfume on the floor. In an attempt to hide his crime and refill the empty bottle, he tries to recreate the smell - by adding all sorts of odd and strange ingredients. He might be able to fool Mrs. Wicket, but can he fool Scrapper and all the neighbourhood cats?

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol. Undeterred he manages to get a push, but for some reason the do-gooders dont want to push him all the way to the beach! Instead he uses wind power, piggy backs on a car transporter and 802harnesses up some horses to try and get to his destination.

programme.title: Mr Bean
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate. Bean begs Mrs. Wicket to let him stay with her. She agrees as long as Bean helps her with cooking cleaning etc. 24 hours later and Bean is desperate to see the back of her. The feeling is mutual. But then Mrs. Wicket starts itching …

programme.desc: Mr. Bean is out shopping when it starts to rain. The bear dreams of an igloo, but the Lemmings have other projects.
