programme.title: Oksjonikutid
programme.desc: Allen lohistab naljase Toni nadalavahetuse oksjonile ja mõned algajad ostjad uritavad kogu kasumit ara suua. Kas rikša, lammutuspall ja detonaatorid on piisavad, et rahuldada Toni isu, või lahevad poisid naljasena koju?

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: From delivery to dine-in, thick or thin crust, pizza is irresistible. Americans consume 350 slices per second, enough to cover Manhattan twice. Join host Bobby Bognar to unveil pizzas secrets, from bacteria to brick ovens.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi makes it clear to the world community that every important Egyptian artefact must be returned to Egypt, and so a missing piece of an offering table is headed back to Karnak Temple from New Yorks Metropolitan Museum of Art.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: See muut pajatab Vana-Kreeka kõige kardetumast jumalast ja surelikest, kes uritasid temaga manipuleerida. See on sunge kogumik lugudest Hadesest ja temaga seotud allilmast, mis on õõvastavalt seotud parismaailma needuste, vaimude ja salasektidega.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.sub-title: A Photo, A Tooth, The Truth?
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: From delivery to dine-in, thick or thin crust, pizza is irresistible. Americans consume 350 slices per second, enough to cover Manhattan twice. Join host Bobby Bognar to unveil pizzas secrets, from bacteria to brick ovens.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: From delivery to dine-in, thick or thin crust, pizza is irresistible. Americans consume 350 slices per second, enough to cover Manhattan twice. Join host Bobby Bognar to unveil pizzas secrets, from bacteria to brick ovens.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Chasing Mummies
programme.desc: Zahi makes it clear to the world community that every important Egyptian artefact must be returned to Egypt, and so a missing piece of an offering table is headed back to Karnak Temple from New Yorks Metropolitan Museum of Art.

programme.title: Jumalate kokkupõrge
programme.desc: See muut pajatab Vana-Kreeka kõige kardetumast jumalast ja surelikest, kes uritasid temaga manipuleerida. See on sunge kogumik lugudest Hadesest ja temaga seotud allilmast, mis on õõvastavalt seotud parismaailma needuste, vaimude ja salasektidega.

programme.title: Search for the Lost Giants
programme.sub-title: A Photo, A Tooth, The Truth?
programme.desc: Search for the Lost Giants follows two brothers on their quest to find lost giants. According to the Bible there were ancient giants wandering along the Earth. A few years ago some Freemasons found stone structures and corridors underground that indicated a lost civilization. The brothers Bill and Jim Viera are looking for evidence of missing bones from ancient skeletons that are suspected to have clocked in at over seven feet tall.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: Gripping and unsettling documentary series that features a team of experts who in each episode examine various footage from news and home video, as well as eyewitness testimony, in order to explain, understand and inform viewers of what actually happened during some of the most devastating natural disasters- including Hurricane Katrina, the earthquake and tsunami that devastated Japan, a monstrous earthquake in Haiti, avalanche of rocks and debris that destroyed a village in Honduras, and many other hurricanes, earthquakes, tsunamis, floodings, droughts and devastating forest fires. They will also investigate how these recent disasters compare and contrast with the most historic natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: This unique documentary series explores what the planet would look like if all human life diappeared. With comment and opinion coming from scientists, engineers and other experts, this show speculates on how a lack of human intervention would impact on the environment and the other animal species. The show does not provide any explanation as to why humans have vanished from the face of the Earth but does surmise that human infrastructure is still present along with pets and domesticated livestock. Each episode explores what would happen to specific structures such as skyscrapers, bridges and dams or details the impact on human remains, artefacts and other objects. Some real-life abandoned locations are discussed and the show also uses CGI dramatisations to depict how the situation would look after one day, one week, one year, 10 years, 15 years, 25 years, 50 years, 100 years, 200 years, etc.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: From delivery to dine-in, thick or thin crust, pizza is irresistible. Americans consume 350 slices per second, enough to cover Manhattan twice. Join host Bobby Bognar to unveil pizzas secrets, from bacteria to brick ovens.

programme.title: How the Earth was made
programme.desc: With the help of expert geologists and various scientists, How the Earth Was Made is a remarkable documentary series that examines the powerful forces and events that have shaped our planet. Using stunning, computer generated cinematography, viewers are transported back billions of years to learn how our planet was formed, and the drastically different changes it has witnessed. Each episode focusses on a different location to explore how it has adapted and adjusted over millions of years, such as the Grand Canyon, Mount Everest, the Sahara desert and the Mariana Trench.

programme.title: Rome
programme.desc: A television documentary series which tells the full story of the origins, development and downfall of the famous Roman Empire between the 2nd century BC to the era of the last Western Roman emperor in the 5th century AD. The Romans are regarded as one of the most revolutionary Empires in the entire course of history and a substantial amount of theories, principles and engineering techniques they experimented with are still applied to this day. This thirteen-part series explores the Germanic, Britannic and other barbarian tribal wars which ultimately led to the fall of the Roman Empire.

programme.title: The Universe
programme.sub-title: Ancient Mysteries Solved: Predicting the Future
programme.desc: Every day, new information is discovered that helps us better understand how our Universe works. Some of this evidence solves mysteries dating back thousands of years. Some evidence offers new theories on how human civilization came into existence. In this season of The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved, well tackle mysteries such as an American Stonehenge built 500 years before Columbus, and how the Aztec Pyramids helped seal the downfall of the Mayan and Aztec empires. Well also look at some of the Roman Empires most iconic structures, and their connection to archeo-astronomy.

programme.title: UFO Hunters
programme.desc: American docuseries following William J. Birnes and his team of "ufologists" as they search for evidence of extra-terrestrial life. Each episode looks into new reported UFO sightings, with some cases involving guests who allege to have been contacted or even abducted by aliens. Listen to witness accounts of shocking close encounters, and join the team as they analyse photographic and video evidence in search of the truth. As they look into some of the most notorious alien hot-spots in the US, theyll investigate whether space is really as empty as we think.

programme.title: Iidsed tulnukad
programme.desc: ANCIENT ALIENS examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs, to ancient Egypt, to the skies over the western desert in the present day US. Ancient cave drawings of strange creatures, an asphalt-like substance in an Egyptian pyramid made from the remains of unidentified creatures, continued mass sightings in the USA -- these are just a few of the strange stories that will be investigated.

programme.title: Ajaloo ruustamine
programme.desc: Michael Steinhardt, suurim antiikesemete erakoguja, on sunnitud loovutama 70 miljoni dollari vaartuses varastatud saaki ja tal keelatakse kogumine. Steinhardti allakaik saabub parast nelja-aastast uurimist, mida tuntakse operatsioonina "Demetra".

programme.title: Doomsday
programme.desc: Inimkonda ahvardab kosmosest katastroofiline, kuid nahtamatu oht. Meie planeedile laheneb ulimassiivne must auk, mille tohutu gravitatsioon võib tekitada ennenagematu võimsusega maavarinaid, vulkaanipurskeid ja tsunamisid.

programme.title: Jaht "Laanemere kullale"
programme.desc: Merevaigukutte varitsevad ohud. Krzysztofi põld ujutatakse ule ja tema autosuvila hakkab suitsema. Sapoorid puhastavad merepõhja plahvatamata miinidest. Dorota alustab oma ehete sertifitseerimist. Laanemerele saabub torm.

programme.title: Snow Patrol - Live At Somerset House
programme.desc: With their third album, Final Straw, selling a cool 1.5 million in the UK in its year of release, Snow Patrols reputation as a remarkable band remains intact. "Live At Somerset House" reveals why the band is praised for delivering fantastic live performances. It also places them at one of Londons most gorgeous settings which complements the bands distinctive and provocative sound perfectly. Performing live for the first time with a string section, this amazing Snow Patrol concert, features all the key hits including Run, Spitting Games, "Chocolate" and a blistering version of Tiny Little Fractures.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: In a career spanning over 25 years, Simply Red blended soul, reggae and jazz to the success of fifty million album sales. The man fronting the group was Mick Hucknall. His distinctive soul tone saw some regard him as one of the voices of his generation. Simply Red would find global success with a revision of a song Hucknall wrote whilst in the Frantic Elevators. Upon its second release in 1986, "Holding Back the Years" notably reached number one on the US Billboard Charts. By 1991, Simply Red were a global success story; after a two year wait they released the much anticipated single, "Something Got Me Started" which showed a new direction for the band. In 2005 Simply Red released the album, Stay. It would be Mick Hucknalls last recording under the group name. Featuring archive material, music videos - "BLUE" "FAIRGROUND" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.title: The Doobie Brothers - Live At Wolf Trap
programme.desc: Filmed in high definition on 25 July 2004 at Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts in Virginia, "Live At Wolf Trap" captures The Doobie Brothers in fine form on a set that mixes classic hits with some rarely performed tracks from across their extensive catalogue. This would prove to be the last recorded footage of long time drummer Keith Knudsen performing with the Doobie Brothers prior to his sad death from cancer in February 2005.

programme.title: Haim - Live at Main Square Festival 2013

programme.title: Slipknot - Day of the Gusano
programme.desc: After more than a decade of patiently waiting, the Mexican Maggots finally welcome the most anticipated visit of Slipknot and Knotfest to Mexico. On December 8th, 2015, Knotfest took over Mexico City for the experience of a lifetime. The most passionate, powerful, dedicated and loud Maggots on Earth attended in hordes to witness in action their most inspirational figures: the 9 members of Slipknot. The band did not disappoint. This show will leave you speechless and craving more. The intensity of Slipknot and the love they have for their fans is palpable. The wait was well worth it.

programme.title: Motorhead - Rock Im Park
programme.desc: Rock im Park is a music festival that takes place in Nuremberg, Germany, lasting three days. Featuring : Motorhead

programme.title: The day the Rock Star Died
programme.desc: John Denver, began his music career with folk music groups during the late 1960s. Starting in the 1970s, he was one of the most popular acoustic artists of the decade and one of its best-selling artists. By 1974, he was firmly established as one of Americas best-selling performers, often described as ""among the most beloved entertainers of his era. Recording and releasing approximately 300 songs, with total sales of over 33 million records worldwide with his lyrics reflecting his joy in nature and disdain for city life, his enthusiasm for music, and his relationship trials. Denver, who was an avid pilot, died at the age of 53 flying his personal Canard aircraft in a single-fatality crash.

programme.title: The Doobie Brothers - Live At Wolf Trap
programme.desc: Filmed in high definition on 25 July 2004 at Wolf Trap National Park for the Performing Arts in Virginia, "Live At Wolf Trap" captures The Doobie Brothers in fine form on a set that mixes classic hits with some rarely performed tracks from across their extensive catalogue. This would prove to be the last recorded footage of long time drummer Keith Knudsen performing with the Doobie Brothers prior to his sad death from cancer in February 2005.

programme.title: Radiohead - The King of Limbs
programme.sub-title: Radiohead - The King of Limbs: Live from the Basement

programme.title: Led Zeppelin _ Physical Graffiti
programme.sub-title: Led Zeppelin _ Physical Graffiti: Album Under Review
programme.desc: This is a documentary film about the build-up, making, release, and - crucially - music contained on this most revered of albums. With the aid of rare and classic performances, scarce interviews, seldom seen photographs and contributions from those involved in the making of the record - plus the review and critique from a panel of Zeppelin experts - this program finally lifts the lid on what many believe to be Led Zeps very finest offering. With contributions from; the albums engineer, Ron Nevison; former Yardbird, Chris Dreja; Swansong recording artist, Maggie Bell; author of The Rough Guide to Led Zeppelin, Nigel Williamson; Tight But Loose editor, Dave Lewis; Classic Rock Magazines Malcolm Dome; renowned guitar tutor and author, Rikky Rooksby and Robert Plant biographer, Neil Daniels. This is the complete story behind what what Rolling Stone called "their Tommy, Beggars Banquet and Sgt. Pepper rolled into one".

programme.title: Pet Shop Boys _ Live at Roskilde
programme.desc: Filmed in Roskilde, Denmark, this concert film will give all fans a spectacular Live experience from start to finish. Classic Pet Shop Boys featuring unforgettable version of their hits: Always On My Wind, West End Girls, "Being Boring" and many more...

programme.title: Kasabian - Live at iTunes Festival
programme.desc: ITunes Festival, is an annual music festival that takes place over a month in London. Sponsored by Apple Inc., it had its first edition in 2007

programme.title: Evanescence - Synthesis Live
programme.desc: In 2003, Evanescence released Fallen, one of the most decade-defining albums (and one of the most successful debut albums of all time) and have gone on to became one of the most well-loved and respected bands of their generation. In the 15 years since their debut, Evanescence founder and lead-singer, Amy Lee, toured the world, has scored motion picture films and even took a 3 year break to start a family. In late 2017, Evanescence re-emerged from their hiatus with Synthesis—a reimagining of their best-known songs with orchestra and electronics and an accompanying sold-out and highly-acclaimed world tour. On November 3, 2017 Evanescence performed "Synthesis Live" in front of a sold out crowd at the Grand Theater at Foxwoods Casino in CT.

programme.title: Lana Del Rey _ Live in London
programme.desc: Born to Die is the second album by singer-songwriter Lana Del Rey, and the first to be officially released on January 27, 2012 and that would lead to global success; In countries such as the United Kingdom the album was the best selling of that year, that recognition made her a guest of honor in one of the most popular London festivals iTunes Festival, where she would open the awe of all attendees on the night of September 25 2012 at the Roundhouse in the city of London.

programme.title: Foals - A Session With Foals
programme.desc: Being from the rain-ridden lands of England, Foals are used to a different kind of festival environment: generally speaking, frontman Yannis Philippakis described them as "mud and wellies" ordeals. So were sure they were quite pleased to travel halfway around the world to the California desert to perform for Coachellas music-hungry crowds. Prior to taking to the stage in Indio, however, Foals made a pit stop at our little poolside bungalow to perform a Festival Fever Session featuring songs off their highly-acclaimed, recent full-length Holy Fire. While you might have already seen the bands in-the-flesh transformation of "My Number" into a slow-burning beaut, weve expanded the session to include the subtle closer "Moon".

programme.title: Bowie
programme.sub-title: Bowie: The Man Who Changed the World
programme.desc: Only true legends of rock music are known by one word. As with "Elvis" everyone knows the name of the most creative and influential rock artist of all time: BOWIE. Bowie was in a state of permanent revolution, constantly re-inventing his persona and sound. He defied any label that the music industry tried to place on him. From Thin White Duke to soulful rocker; music, art, fashion and sexuality were Bowies playthings - he was truly an artistic chameleon.

programme.title: The Offspring - Rock AM
programme.desc: The Offspring is an American rock band from Garden Grove, California, formed in 1984. Originally formed under the name Manic Subsidal, the bands lineup consists of lead vocalist and rhythm guitarist Bryan "Dexter" Holland, bassist Todd Morse and lead guitarist Kevin "Noodles" Wasserman.

programme.title: Music Icons
programme.desc: Depeche Mode formed as the 70s came to an end, in Basildon, Essex. The new decade before them would bring a revolution in electronic music and the band tapped right into it. After signing to Daniel Millers label, Mute, the group released their first single, Dreaming of Me. Depeche Mode continued to climb the charts and by their third release, Just Cant Get Enough, they were a UK Top 10 act. Violator became Depeche Modes biggest selling album. In the US alone it had sold four and a half million copies. The single, Enjoy the Silence, helped push these sales by going gold internationally. Featuring archive material, music videos - "I FEEL LOVED" "WRONG" and, exclusive insights from music critics and journalists JOHN AIZLEWOOD (Evening Standard), DANIELLE PERRY (XFM), WILL HODGKINSON (The Times) and CAMILLA PIA (BBC Radio 6)

programme.title: Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood - Live from Madison Square Garden
programme.desc: History rocked and rock made history during a sold-out three-gig stand at Madison Square Garden in late February 2008 when icons Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood performed a concert together for the first time since their all-too-brief days in the legendary Blind Faith in 1969. Whether they will ever team again is unknown. But with Eric Clapton and Steve Winwood Live From Madison Square Garden fans everywhere are able to experience the sound and the glory of a performance on that famous stage by two of rocks greatest artists.

programme.desc: When a new girl arrives in town, she attracts the local, married heartthrob. When they embark on an affair, it leads to mayhem and murder.

programme.title: Who Killed the Co-Ed? An ID Murder Mystery
programme.desc: When a college student is found brutally murdered in her off-campus apartment, the evidence makes police think she knew her killer. Six years later, her murderer is still at large.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: In 1981, 13-year-old Mary Day vanished and investigators suspect that her stepfather may have killed her, but they never recovered her body, and decades later, a woman claiming to be Mary appears, which stirs up suspicion and debate.

programme.title: Who Is Luigi Mangione?
programme.desc: 26-year-old Luigi Mangione is a young man from wealth and privilege. What drove him to the deadly shooting of United Healthcare CEO, Brian Thompson?

programme.title: Dead of Night
programme.desc: Investigations of real-life murders which occurred during nighttime in different towns across America. Night is the part of the day when its easiest for dangerous killers to catch their victims. Individuals who find themselves alone in the dark become targets of horrible predators who are looking for an opportunity to kill. In the morning their loved ones are looking for them desperately.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: Kellega ma kull abiellusin?
programme.desc: Shocking revelations ensue in this deceptive documentary series, where marital relationships built on lies are examined, revealing cases of betrayal, bemusement, and sheer audacity. Featuring dramatised reconstructions and interviews with the spouses involved, each episode tells a story about a particular relationship that has fallen apart after an outrageous discovery. These husbands and wives thought they were marrying their soulmates, but after noticing something peculiar about their better half, they decided to investigate further, revealing cases of double-lives, criminal activity, even sinister killings.

programme.title: Kellega ma kull abiellusin?

programme.title: Betrayed
programme.desc: A true crime show with a twist - the chiling stories are told from the fictionalised first-person pespective of the victim. The stories reveal that victims are often normal, average Americans with everyday dreams and concerns about money, their relationshiips, their jobs, their family, etc. who fall prey to the betrayal of friends, colleagues, family members or lovers. The motives vary in each epsiode, from jealousies concerning an extramarital affair to robbery, personal vendettas and secret ambitions. The show uses dramatised recreations of the events to bring the viewer closer to the people involved and also includes interviews with the victims family and the detectives who investigated the crime.

programme.title: Betrayed

programme.title: Tõelised kuriteod Aphrodite Jonesiga
programme.desc: Crime documentary series hosted by Aphrodite Jones who looks into real-life crimes including some of the most atrocious murders of recent times. Jones shares details of these gruesome crimes alongside authentic footage, evidence and interviews with people associated to the case – sometimes even the perpetrator themselves. Subjects featured in the series include such high-profile cases as O. J. Simpson, Michael Jackson, the notorious Zodiac serial killer and the music producer Phil Spector. Jones attempts to get inside the minds of her subjects to better understand their motives for committing such unspeakable crimes. Aphrodite Jones is a true-crime expert, a former crime reporter for FOX News and the author of eight books.

programme.title: Love, Honor and Betray
programme.desc: Follow the intimate and shocking stories of people who got deceived by their spouses in a myriad of ways: from lies and cheating to hiding serious crimes like murder. Riveting and heart-wrenching testimonies of people devastated by the betrayal of their loved ones and the consequences it had on their and the life of their families as a whole. programme.title: Before I Die
programme.desc: Before I Die is a series revolving around those brave people who had enough strength and courage to pass a message about their own killer to the police. Even in the last moments of their life they somehow managed to communicate and by doing so help to solve their case and find the perpetrator, stop him from harming other people. Have a look at the stories where peoples lives have been shattered by the murder and changed the life of their closest and dearest forever.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Serial killers hiding in plain sight and murderers living perfect family life. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Ameerika monstrum
programme.desc: Serial killers hiding in plain sight and murderers living perfect family life. American Monster reveals the truth behind some of the most shocking crimes thats happened around the country. Through dramatization and never-seen-before footage, each case shows you that anyone can be a monster, but it also allows us to understand how they became monsters. Through testimonies of family members and friends, along with home videos showing them at their most innocent, this true-crime drama gives us a closer look at the double life of some of the most ruthless monster in American history.

programme.title: Caught In the Net
programme.desc: The tragic murder of a 14-year-old girl in Michigan leaves behind little physical evidence, forcing investigators to enter the digital world in search of clues.

programme.title: Caught In the Net
programme.desc: When 26-year-old Erica Crippen Crosby disappears from her home in New Jersey, detectives must follow a digital trail to uncover the truth about what happened to her.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: Explore the dark side of cities before and after the sun goes down, when the onset of darkness transforms the cityscape into a fantasy playground.

programme.title: Last Night in...
programme.desc: Explore the dark side of cities before and after the sun goes down, when the onset of darkness transforms the cityscape into a fantasy playground.

programme.title: Southern Gothic
programme.desc: This gritty documentary series takes a look at the dark underbelly of the American South. It deals with true crime stories from this unique part of the country with its decaying vegetation, sinister plantations, rusty farm implements and foreboding swamps. Episodes deal with cases such as when a womans body is discovered floating in a creek, her family secrets, age-old disputes and a suspicious funeral point to a complex conspiracy; when a college student is assaulted and burned in her dorm room; when three teenagers disappear and are found dead, sparking the states largest manhunt; when a loving mother is shot dead at a Memphis gas station; and when the local Baptist church is involved in the shooting of a young husband.

programme.title: Southern Gothic
programme.desc: This gritty documentary series takes a look at the dark underbelly of the American South. It deals with true crime stories from this unique part of the country with its decaying vegetation, sinister plantations, rusty farm implements and foreboding swamps. programme.title: Before I Die
programme.desc: Before I Die is a series revolving around those brave people who had enough strength and courage to pass a message about their own killer to the police. Even in the last moments of their life they somehow managed to communicate and by doing so help to solve their case and find the perpetrator, stop him from harming other people. Have a look at the stories where peoples lives have been shattered by the murder and changed the life of their closest and dearest forever.

programme.title: Border Control
programme.desc: Customs check for drugs at a party cruise with hundreds of young people. Plus, an angry woman sheds her clothes at Arlanda airport.

programme.title: Kurjus elab siin
programme.desc: Based on real life events. Evil Lives Here is a true crime story show that speaks to family members of well-known murderers and criminals. It includes re-enactments, police footage, family photographs and videos that gives you the view through the murderers eyes. The programme is also styled to make you imagine it in the eyes of a loved one that you know. It is an in-depth investigation into the criminals life and the life of the family after the crime. It also looks into possible reasons why the criminal committed the crime without placing a viewpoint.

programme.title: The Curious Case of...
programme.desc: In 1981, 13-year-old Mary Day vanished and investigators suspect that her stepfather may have killed her, but they never recovered her body, and decades later, a woman claiming to be Mary appears, which stirs up suspicion and debate.

programme.title: Who Is Luigi Mangione?
programme.desc: 26-year-old Luigi Mangione is a young man from wealth and privilege. What drove him to the deadly shooting of United Healthcare CEO, Brian Thompson?

programme.title: The Lake Erie Murders
programme.desc: Coming from the beautiful environs of Lake Erie, straddling the border between the US and Canada, this true life crime show focuses on the more sinister and gruesome tales of some of the regions darkest and deadliest crimes. We explore baffling and mysterious murder cases such as that of the 1989 kidnapping and murder of 10-year-old Amy Mihaljevic which provoked much speculation and intrigue in the area and which is still an open case. Each hourlong episode delves into the case history, analyzes the facts and evidence and carefully examines the detection procedures and how each suspect was cleared of suspicion. Subsequent episodes detail four additional deadly crimes that were solved by local law enforcement.

programme.title: Juhi lapsepõlv
programme.desc: Kroonika Esimese maailmasõja jargse juhi lapsepõlvest.

programme.title: Suur Vallrahu
programme.desc: Suur Vallrahu on elav ja hingav organism, mis toetab planeedi kõige rikkalikumat ja keerukamat okosusteemi.

programme.title: Maaratud ellujaaja
programme.desc: Ajakirjanik Abe Leonardi pommuudise avaldamine tõukab roobastelt maha president Kirkmani esimese rahvusvahelise tippkohtumise. Samal ajal avastab Hannah Wells vandenõu jargmise sihtmargi.

programme.title: Tumeaine
programme.desc: Raza meeskond reedeti Kuue poolt, kes osutub Galaktika Ametivõimu ametnikuks. Kaks, Kolm ja Neli leiavad end Hyperion-8 rangeima režiimiga vanglast. Üks vabastati tanu Derrick Mossi tutvustele, kuid ta pole kindel, keda usaldada. Kuus ja GA puuavad veenda Viit ja Androidi endiste meeskonnaliikmete vastu tunnistusi andma.

programme.title: Masterchef Soome
programme.desc: Võistlejad peavad valmistama šokolaadikera, mille all asub hõrk magustoit. Kohtunikud Helena Puolakka, Henri Alen ja Kari Aihinen. Kulaliskohtunik Eero Paulamaki.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam on armukade, kui Teddy nimetab kooliessees Andit oma kangelaseks.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam kutsub Andi kogemata iga-aastasele meestereisile ning uritab seejarel kutsest taganeda, aga see muudab olukorra vaid hullemaks.

programme.title: Miss Fallaci
programme.desc: Oriana suhe Alfredoga muutub aina intensiivsemaks. Kui ta saab teada, et mees kohtub kellegi teisega, kukub tema maailm kokku. Siis aga avastab ta, et ootab last. Et mitte Alfredot kaotada, nõustub ta aborti tegema.

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: Kas sci-fi kokkutulekul tapetud teleprodutsendi surma uurimine laidab Hodgesi ja Wendy vahel ebatõenaolise armuleegi?

programme.title: Tõustes ja langedes
programme.desc: Kahe mehe vahel arkab uskumatu sõprus: neist uks on L.A.-s ebaõnnestunud, saba jalge vahel koju naasnud stand-up koomik, teine paljude vigadega, kuid sarmikas ja karismaatiline alkohoolikust nahaarst.

programme.title: Kill Bill _ Pruudi kattemaks vol 1
programme.desc: Kassahitist põnevusmarul, mis on vurtsitatud uliefektsete võitlusstseenidega. Pruudi (Uma Thurman) ja ulejaanud pulmaliste verised kehad lamavad kabelipõrandal… Kuratlik Bill ning tema kõrilõikajad tegid aga saatusliku vea. Pruut ei surnud saadud haavadesse, vaid langes lihtsalt koomasse. Neli aastat hiljem teadvusele tulles asub naine tasumisretkele, et kriipsutada jargemooda maha kõik nimed oma "surmanimekirjast", kus viimasena seisab Billi nimi…

programme.title: Rait, Raivo ja naised Iraanis
programme.desc: Reisisellid liiguvad Lõuna-Iraanist tagasi põhja poole ning alles nuud avaneb seltskonnal võimalus naha kaunist Parsia arhidektuuri ilu - mudast majad ning lossid võtavad eestlastel sõnad suust. Iraan ei valmista oma kulalislahkuse osas pettumust ning kohaliku abiga saab tee joomise kõrvalt broneeritud põnev hotell liivaduunide aares, kuhu ka hilisõhtuks jõutakse. Hotell on samuti nagu ehtsas kunagises Parsias - suur mudast ja põhust ruum, kuhu kaetakse laud kombekohaselt vaibale.

programme.title: Rait, Raivo ja naised Iraanis
programme.desc: Reisiseltskond arkab iidses mudahotellis ning laheb õue avastama, millised on need liivaduunid, kuhu automehed nii kangesti jõuda tahavad. Paeva edenedes tuutab Raiti pikk asfaltee ara ning ta otsustab proovida mõnda huvitavamat teed. Tunnid hiljem saame teada, et suund, mis Rait võttis on vale ja isegi keelatud. Õhtul linnas laagrivarusid taiendades eskorditakse meid kõiki aga politseijaoskonda...

programme.title: Maaratud ellujaaja
programme.desc: Hannah Wells peab peatama vandenõu viimase runnaku taideviimise, samal ajal annab president Kirkman loa riigiuleseks inimjahiks kogu vandenõu peaideoloogile.

programme.title: Tumeaine
programme.desc: Hyperion-8 vanglas ahvardab meeskonda igal sammul hadaoht. Kaks, Kolm ja Neli planeerivad põgenemist, kaasvangide abiga. Üleminspektor Shaddick GA Raskete Kuritegude Osakonnast proovib meeskonda ules tunnistama panna. Kuus uurib oma minevikku GA ametnikuna ja avastatu šokeerib teda.

programme.title: Masterchef Soome
programme.desc: Kari õpetab meistriklassis valmistama maitsvaid koogivilju. Loovusulesandes peavad võistlejad valmistama koogiviljaroa. Kohtunikud Helena Puolakka, Henri Alen ja Kari Aihinen.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam soovib, et Marcy paneks Andi pirtsaka õe Kelly paika, kui too neid kulastab.

programme.title: Mees teab
programme.desc: Adam ja Andi otsustavad korraldada sekkumise, nahes kuidas Lowelli tema uus suhe Andi õe Kellyga mõjutab.

programme.title: Elon Muski show
programme.desc: Kui Elon Muski arid saavad seniolematult edukaks, suureneb ka mehe avalik profiil. Ent Eloni kaitumine satub veelgi suurema kriitika alla.

programme.title: CSI Kriminalistid
programme.desc: Juurdlus Catherinei minevikust avatakse uuesti, kui 18 aastat vanglas veetnud mees seab tema suudimõistmisel kasutatud asitõendid kahtluse alla.

programme.title: Kill Bill _ Pruudi kattemaks vol 2
programme.desc: Quentin Tarantino kassahiti teine film. Pruut (Uma Thurman) jatkab oma verist tasumistood. "Surmanimekirja" on alles jaanud ainult kolm nime, nendest viimane on Bill… ehk veritasu ihkava pruudi kunagine tooandja ja armastatu.

programme.title: Hadavale
programme.desc: Neljal orvul õnnestub jaada ellu, kui nende kodukula Sudaanis runnatakse. Sellele jargnev teekond Keenias asuvasse põgenikelaagrisse on pikk ja raske. Kumme aastat hiljem avaneb neil võimalus kolida Ameerika Ühendriikidesse, kus tuleb taas kohaneda uue maailmaga.

programme.title: Fabelmanid
programme.desc: Seitsmele Oscarile kandideerinud sudamlik draama. Steven Spielbergi ("Schindleri nimekiri") autobiograafiliste sugemetega meistriteos raagib tema armastusest kinokunsti vastu ning tema perekonna ajaloost. Nooruke Sammy Fabelman kasvab ules teise maailmasõja jargses Arizonas. Teismeliseks saades tunneb ta uha tugevamalt, et tema kutsumus on saada režissooriks. Sammy saab jalile perekonnaseadusele ning mõistab, kuidas filmides peituv salajõud õpetab teda nagema tõde. Mangivad Michelle Williams ("Manchester by the Sea"), Paul Dano ("Veri hakkab voolama"), Seth Rogen ("Kõht ette") jt.

programme.title: Sommerdahli mõrvad
programme.desc: Uue krimisarja juhtumid leiavad aset vaikeses Taani rannaaarses linnakeses Helsingoris, kus uurimisruhma tood juhib Dan Sommerdahl. Dan ja tema naine Marianne tahistavad oma pulmaaastapaeva, kuid peomeeleolu katkestab Kronborgi lossi kõrvalt leitud noore naise surnukeha. Kuna naine on asja sunnitanud, algab ajaga võidujooks lootuses imik veel elusana leida.

programme.title: Papsid
programme.desc: Sarja neljas hooaeg toob kaasa ootamatud poorded! Toomas seisab silmitsi sotsiaalameti tahelepanuga ning kaalub tagasikolimist Võrumaale, mis tekitab pingeid Sassuga. Samal ajal saab Raivo pitsaari ootamatu tõuke tuntud juutuuberi kaudu, kuid tema suhe Marikaga pannakse proovile salaparase austaja ilmumisega. Aleksi sudant puudutab unistuste naine Andra - tee tema sudamesse osutub aga keeruliseks katsumuseks. Hooaja avaosas uritab Marika Mutti Kristiina eest varjata, aga see ei õnnestu. Aleks on veendunud, et sotsiaalametile Toomase kohta anonuumse kaebuse saatnud isik on tema amm. Linda ei kannata enam Jareki kaitumist valja ning laheb ooseks ema juurde.

programme.title: Heeringas Veenuse õlal
programme.desc: Vaimukates sketšides astuvad ules armastatud Eesti naitlejad: Taavi Teplenkov, Tiit Sukk, Marilyn Jurman, Tiina Tauraite, Margus Prangel ja Liina Vahtrik.

programme.title: Reporter+
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: Võsavinkel
programme.desc: Võsavinkel on reportaažidesari Peeter Võsa eestvedamisel. Uue saatesarja jooksul võetakse ette rannak mooda Eestimaad, et ules otsida huvitavad karakterid ning persoonid. Avaepisoodis sõidame kulla Otile, kes elab Kalitsa koorevabrikus.

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: Roaldi retked
programme.desc: Super-uber-mega-luksusjahte seilab maailma meredel tuhandeid ja tuhandeid, kuid kuuldavasti on just viimased COVIDi-aastad andnud uute jahtide ehitusele veelgi võimsama hoo sisse. See on ulirikaste inimeste suletud maailm, mille paotamine laiemale avalikkusele pole alati võimalik. Aga Roald Johannson teeb proovi ja otsib ules kaks eestlast, Karli ja Krisli, kes on selles eksklusiivses maailmas tõelised tegijad.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Malit vaevab suutunne. Irene korraldab õhtusoogi, mis ei lõpe hasti. John on nõutu.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Natalie Teeger laseb maha tema majja tunginud roovli. Monk peab lahendama, miks roovel tahtis varastada Natalie tutre kuldkala.

programme.title: Magipaastjad
programme.desc: 18-aastane Alexandra kaotas kolme aasta eest isa, kes oli kirglik magironija. Tudruk usub, et isa on siiski veel elus ja asub teda omal kael magedest otsima. Talv magedes on aga ohtlik ja tudruk satub hatta, kukkudes jaisesse jõkke. Tema ellujaamisšansid vahenevad iga minutiga.

programme.title: Saatuslik kiri
programme.desc: Alanur utleb otse valja, et tema arvates ei saa Bestel Mahmutiga uhist tulevikku olla. Beste on oma emas taas kord pettunud. Kui Alanur saab teada, et Seheri kaevõru Aslile otsa sõitnud autost leiti, korraldab ta Karlide majas stseeni, suudistades kogu pere ees Seherit tema tutre mõrvamise katses. Aslis tarkab kahtlus, et Seher võis tõesti suudi olla.

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Marie saab ahvatleva toopakkumise Weilheimist. Angie paastab autoavarii teinud Simoni elu ja saab endale uue austaja. Irene ja Ernst puuavad Mariet ja Stefanit ara lepitada.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Vallavanemat hairib naabri puu, mis hommikupaikest varjab. Remmelgasaaga kordub Esnas. Kirikuõpetaja tahab usku levitada, aga saab kaela ahistamissuudistuse. Tola uurib Kroosmanilt toa, aga see saab olema rank viga. Bussijaama pustitatakse lapsetegemistelk, et iivet tõsta. Vallas juba igav ei hakka.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: 15 kusimust
programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Kuuuurija
programme.desc: Julge ja kompromissitu Kuuuurija kajastab keerulisi ning tundlikke teemasid, millel on suur sotsiaalne ja uhiskondlik mõju. Saatejuht Katrin Lust avab Eesti elu varjatuima poole suvenedes probleemidesse ja inimeste muredesse ule Eesti. Selles saates uurime pettust, mis viidi toime Kiviõli linnas. Tuleb valja, et petturid kavaldasid ule isegi notari, kes tuleb valja - eksis.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

programme.title: Metsiku Roose jalgedes
programme.desc: Seekordses episoodis jõuame kohta, mis on olnud eesmark esimest paevast peale! Meid võetakse vastu kohalikus telestuudios, mis toodab seebiseriaale tervele maailmale! Naeme kaadritaguseid, staare ja palju muudki huvitavat!

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Meeskond uurib inimroovi salajases varjupaigas, mis on mõeldud perevagivalla ohvritele.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: Tiim jalitab kurikuulsat Ameerika tehnoloogiamagnaati, keda suudistatakse Frankfurdis toimunud mõrvas. Seda tehes satuvad nad silmitsi kohalike meeleavaldajatega, keda kuri geenius sotsiaalmeedias vandenõuteooriatega õhutanud on.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

programme.desc: Meeskond uurib inimroovi salajases varjupaigas, mis on mõeldud perevagivalla ohvritele.

programme.title: Minu kodu on parim
programme.desc: Võistluses on kuus paari, kes hakkavad unelmate auhinna nimel uksteise maju renoveerima. Igal tiimil on oma eelarve ja neile maaratakse konkreetne osa kaasvõistleja kodust ning aiast, mis tuleb võimalikult agedaks ja stiilseks muuta. Kuna selleks ettenahtud aeg on piiratud, seisavad võistlevad paarid silmitsi karmide valjakutsetega – lisaks lennukale fantaasiale ja kuldsetele katele paneb see proovile ka nende omavahelised suhted, sest pinge all kipuvad emotsioonid kontrolli alt valjuma. Esimesena võetakse kasile Jemma ja Beni ligi 70 aastat tagasi ehitatud maja.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: Kuuuurija
programme.desc: Julge ja kompromissitu Kuuuurija kajastab keerulisi ning tundlikke teemasid, millel on suur sotsiaalne ja uhiskondlik mõju. Saatejuht Katrin Lust avab Eesti elu varjatuima poole suvenedes probleemidesse ja inimeste muredesse ule Eesti. Selles saates uurime pettust, mis viidi toime Kiviõli linnas. Tuleb valja, et petturid kavaldasid ule isegi notari, kes tuleb valja - eksis.

programme.title: Kodus ja võõrsil
programme.desc: Perril on oma erilisel paeval raskusi. Irene põletab sildu. John puuab oma parimat sõpra paasta.

programme.title: Monk
programme.desc: Monk naeb pealt Hiina maffia mõrva. Ta pannakse tunnistajakaitseprogrammi ning saadetakse uksikusse metsamajakesse.

programme.title: Magipaastjad
programme.desc: Julia ja Georg lahevad talvisele magimatkale kiviaegseid koopaid otsima. Nende vahel tekib tuli ja vallanduvad kogunenud pinged. Selgub, et Julial on juba pikemat aega olnud salajane afaar. Tuli kagus Georg libiseb ja kukub sugavikku. Magipaastjad ruttavad appi, ent paastmine osutub aarmiselt keeruliseks. Tekib lambumisoht, kuna susinikdioksiidi vaartus on liiga kõrge.

programme.title: Saatuslik kiri
programme.desc: Asli usub seda, mida naeb. Mehmet aga ei suuda uskuda, et kõige taga oli ta ema. See viib aga paari teineteisest eemaldumiseni. Mehmeti poolt nurka surutud Nevzat tunnistab Seherile oma teod ules. Seher nõuab, et Nevzat hoiaks kõike saladuses.

programme.title: Leegitsev armastus
programme.desc: Max ja Daniel elavad Philippi juures. Angie austaja osutub pesuehtsaks ahistajaks. Kui politseist abi ei saa, võtab Marie ohjad enda katte.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Rahvas vajab meelelahutust ja Vallavanem otsustab korraldada tsirkuseetenduse. Head truppi on keeruline leida ja bussijaam kambal tuleb kogu show enda peale võtta. Kirikuõpetaja astub tsirkuse vastu võitlusse ja agiteerib massu, sest kardab looma piinamist. Varik asub vaikselt, aga jarjekindlalt Aliina sudant võitma.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: 15 kusimust
programme.desc: Kodumaine strateegiline malumang, mille muudab kaasahaaravaks põnev vihjete susteem ja strateegia element. Saates on vastamisi kaks mangijat, kel on võimalus hakata panustama enda tugevustele ning samal ajal vastase nõrkusele. Mõnikord võib selline tegutsemine edu tuua, aga teinekord hoopis katte maksta ning vajalikest punktidest ilma jatta. Saadet juhib Juri Butšakov.

programme.title: Taistund
programme.desc: Ajakirjanduslik paevakajasaade toob vaatajateni põhjalikult uuritud ja inimlahedased lood nii Eestist kui ka mujalt maailmast. Ajakirjanikud Elo Mõttus-Leppik, Sander Punamae, Mart Mardisalu, Neeme Raud, Raul Ranne ja Madis Kimmel kasitlevad uhiskonnas olulisi teemasid, mis tekitavad sageli laiemat diskussiooni ja aitavad esile tõsta lahendamist vajavad probleemid. Lisaks aktuaalsetele kusimustele avardab Taistund ka vaataja silmaringi, pakkudes sugavamaid arusaamu meid umbritsevast maailmast.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim politseisaade toob vaatajateni olulisemad krimiuudised. Uudiseid elu pahupoolelt vahendab saatejuht Taavi Otsus.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Meeskond otsib kahtlusalust, kes hoidis naist mitu kuud vangis, piinates teda fuusiliselt ja puudes teda psuhholoogiliselt manipuleerida, et ta oma identiteedi unustaks.

programme.title: FBI
programme.desc: FBI rahvusvahelise uksuse agendid reisivad mooda maailma, eesmargiga kaitsta ameeriklasi kõikjal, kus nad ka poleks.

programme.title: Õhtu!
programme.desc: Meelelahutuslik ja manguline vestlussaade "Õhtu!" on seltsiks argiõhtutel. Saatejuhid Robert Rool ja Juri Butšakov ullatavad uute teemade, kulaliste ja mangudega ning muudavad toopaeva õhtud alati positiivseks ja heatujuliseks.

programme.title: Naabriplika
programme.desc: Rahvas vajab meelelahutust ja Vallavanem otsustab korraldada tsirkuseetenduse. Head truppi on keeruline leida ja bussijaam kambal tuleb kogu show enda peale võtta. Kirikuõpetaja astub tsirkuse vastu võitlusse ja agiteerib massu, sest kardab looma piinamist. Varik asub vaikselt, aga jarjekindlalt Aliina sudant võitma.

programme.title: Chicago politseijaoskond
programme.desc: Meeskond otsib kahtlusalust, kes hoidis naist mitu kuud vangis, piinates teda fuusiliselt ja puudes teda psuhholoogiliselt manipuleerida, et ta oma identiteedi unustaks.

programme.title: Krimi
programme.desc: Eesti staažikaim politseisaade toob vaatajateni olulisemad krimiuudised. Uudiseid elu pahupoolelt vahendab saatejuht Taavi Otsus.

programme.title: Minu kodu on parim
programme.desc: Võistluses on kuus paari, kes hakkavad unelmate auhinna nimel uksteise maju renoveerima. Igal tiimil on oma eelarve ja neile maaratakse konkreetne osa kaasvõistleja kodust ning aiast, mis tuleb võimalikult agedaks ja stiilseks muuta. Kuna selleks ettenahtud aeg on piiratud, seisavad võistlevad paarid silmitsi karmide valjakutsetega – lisaks lennukale fantaasiale ja kuldsetele katele paneb see proovile ka nende omavahelised suhted, sest pinge all kipuvad emotsioonid kontrolli alt valjuma. Esimesena võetakse kasile Jemma ja Beni ligi 70 aastat tagasi ehitatud maja.

programme.title: Reporter
programme.desc: Uudistemagasinide lipulaev, mis toob olulisemad ja põnevamad uudised kodumaalt ja mujalt maailmast vaatajateni Reporterile omasel mahlakal moel. Saatejuhid on alati soliidsed Jaanus Koort, Simon Suviste ja Tõnis Sarap.

programme.title: Telehommik
programme.desc: "Tere hommikust, Telehommik alustab," utlevad saatejuhid Kristjan Gold ja Romi Hasa teile Kanal 2 otsestuudiost. Kaasahaarav hommikuprogramm annab hommikule ja kogu paevale asjaliku ja praktilise ning huvitava ja positiivse stardi. Telehommik toob juba varahommikul vaatajani uudised ule Eesti!

programme.title: Pull
programme.desc: 90ndad oma kuritegevuse ja majandusraskustega. Noor jõuguliider Anton Bõkov huudnimega Pull on pere nimel valmis kõigeks. Ta satub tulistamise tõttu miilitsajaoskonda, kust paaseb tanu uhele Moskva autoriteedile. Vastutasuks soovib too vaikest, kuid ohtlikku teenet.

programme.title: Võmm ja selgeltnagija
programme.desc: У начальника райотдела Полозкова пропадает внучка. Вместе с подругой-одноклассницей, дочерью известного в Ровенске бизнесмена, девочки буквально растворяются в воздухе. Куликова отрабатывает версию о конфликте интересов в бизнесе, а Амосов опрашивает первоклашек. Подозрение падает на фотографа, которому для модной съёмки понадобились девочки. К расследованию привлекают Елену Воробьяшкину.

programme.title: Võmm ja selgeltnagija
programme.desc: Амосов и Бычков расследуют дерзкие ограбления в квартирах. У краж общий почерк: преступники проникают внутрь без взлома, при этом они берут только драгоценности, а деньги не трогают. Расследование приводит героев в местный цирк-шапито.

programme.title: Avastamata Aasia
programme.desc: Центральная Азия – это бедный регион, где люди живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мифы о местах любого переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют русских или людей других национальностей. В каждой программе – эти мифы (стереотипы) будут развеяны или доказаны. Также расскажем о забытых традициях в Центральной Азии, а также попробуем блюда ЦА, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Ootame kulla
programme.desc: В жаркие августовские дни многие жители Грузии выбрали местом отдыха высокогорную Рачу. Мы посетили край живописной природы, чтобы рассказать об интересных местах и увлечениях героев программы. Среди них - винодел, который увлекся архиологией и создал дома целый музей орудий труда людей периода неолита, собранных на берегу реки Риони. Необычны миниатюрные статуэтки уроженца края художника Бесо Кобахидзе, покорившие ценителей марионеток по всему миру. А также в программе - храм II века, построенный в альпийской зоне, и самый известный в Амбролаури кулинар, который готовит все блюда из рачинской ветчины "лори".

programme.title: Tutred-emad
programme.desc: Selgub, et nii Natalja kui ka tema ja Igori 16-aastane tutar on lapseootel. Alustava gumnaasiumidirektorina ootab Nataliat ees hulk katsumusi. Veterinaarist Igoril on võimatu oma lemmiklloomade tõttu uurida korterit.

programme.title: Tutred-emad
programme.desc: Kristina minestab loomakliinikus ja arkab haiglas, kus saab teada, et ta on lapseootel. Kristina ei luba isal sellest emale raakida. Nii kuuleb ema selle kohta Igori tookaaslaselt Antonilt. Kooli saabub inspektor, kes on õnneks Nataliale tuttav.

programme.title: Екатерина. Фавориты
programme.desc: 1779 год. Уже два года длится война между Австрией и Пруссией, и обе стороны просят помощи у Российской империи. Но Екатерина Великая не намерена вступать в войну, она планирует примирить Иосифа и Фридриха. При поддержке Потемкина Екатерина отправляется на тайную встречу с королем Австрии Иосифом. Перед заключением Тешенского мира Екатерина и Потемкин ссорятся, и Екатерина ищет утешения в объятиях своего фаворита графа Корсакова.

programme.title: Екатерина. Фавориты
programme.desc: Американские колонии Англии взбунтовались. Английский король Георг ставит условие всем странам Европы, в том числе и России, прервать торговлю с американскими землями. Императрица проводит много времени с Корсаковым, это заставляет ее отвлекаться от мучительных мыслей о Потемкине. В это время из Крыма в столицу прибывает адъютант князя - ротмистр Ланской. Его восторженный взгляд и смущение не укрываются от взгляда императрицы.

programme.title: Патрон та друзі
programme.desc: Кейт - собака породы бельгийская овчарка малинуа, служит в полиции. У Кейт есть талант в поиске оружия и взрывчатки, которой с начала войны стало больше в транспорте столицы. Кроме того, Кейт помогает снять стресс у детей беженцев.

programme.title: Avastamata Aasia
programme.sub-title: Улкен. Жизнь в надежде и страхе
programme.desc: Центральная Азия – это бедный регион, где люди живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мифы о местах любого переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют русских или людей других национальностей. В каждой программе – эти мифы (стереотипы) будут развеяны или доказаны. Также расскажем о забытых традициях в Центральной Азии, а также попробуем блюда ЦА, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Ootame kulla
programme.desc: Абсолютное большинство туристов, приезжающих в Грузию, отмечают, что самое ценное для них - это возможность общения. Знаменитое грузинское гостеприимство во многом определяет отношение гостей к стране. Джаба Хвичия - человек, который уверен, что "ни что так не сближает людей, как застолье". Именно за традиционным грузинским столом можно узнать о культуре народа очень многое. И тут, как утверждают, Джабе нет равных.

programme.title: Motylki
programme.desc: Конец апреля 1986 года. Врач Марьяна решает поехать на выходные к родственникам в Припять. С собой она берет младшую сестру, старшеклассницу Алю. По дороге девушки видят страшный взрыв на Чернобыльской АЭС. Марьяна получает смертельную дозу облучения, но узнав, что в городе требуется врачебная помощь, забыв о себе, отправляется в больницу и помогает другим. К Але приходит рядовой Павел Державин, он приносит девочке записку от ее отца, маойра вертолетных войск. Между юношей и девушкой вспыхивает любовь с первого взгляда.

programme.title: Motylki
programme.desc: В Припяти объявлена эвакуация, но Аля остается в городе, потому что хочет узнать о судьбе отца. Увы, во время выполнения вылета к горящему реактору, его вертолет падает и Николай погибает. О его смерти девочка узнает от Паши. Она в отчаянье и умоляет его остаться и не бросать ее в одиночестве. Но Паша возвращается в часть и во время работы на крыше горящего реактора получает смертельную дозу облучения…

programme.title: Motylki
programme.desc: Паше становится лучше, и он убегает из госпиталя, чтобы выполнить обещание, данное Але и увидеть ее снова. Влюбленные проводят в абсолютно пустом городе целый день. Несмотря на то, что вокруг царит хаос и смерть, они счастливы. Но утром Паше становится плохо. Они принимают решение пешком уйти из города, для того, чтобы найти помощь…

programme.title: Провинциальный детектив
programme.desc: Дана Левицкая - дочь владельца химического комбината города Мухина убита во время сеанса ретроградного гипноза. Отец не выдерживает такого удара судьбы и умирает от инфаркта. Все улики против психотерапевта Андрея Самойлова ведь он был рядом с Даной во время ее смерти. Но ответы снова кроются в прошлом.

programme.title: Olga
programme.desc: Ольга продолжает спасение Лены. Гриша следит за Юргеном, но не в силах сидеть на месте решает помочь Ольге. Аня, Марьяна, Юля и Куба в поисках Льва едут в Ленинградскую область.

programme.title: Olga
programme.desc: К Ольге в салон с деловым предложением приходит Ярик. Лена погружается в депрессию. А Саша пытается достучаться до Тимофея.

programme.title: Hudson ja Rex
programme.desc: Kui noor naine jaab The Barrensis kadunuks, langeb kahtlus naise poiss-sõbrale ja tiimi ulesandeks on paljastada tõde tema kadumise kohta.

programme.title: Шаляпин
programme.desc: Фёдор Шаляпин на пике славы. Ему предстоит громкая премьера в Большом театре, все билеты раскуплены, его дом осаждают влюблённые в его талант поклонники. Но вскоре может разразиться грандиозный скандал: Шаляпин отказывается петь из-за дурного самочувствия. Фёдор подозревает, что у него ларингит, однако доктор уверяет, что его здоровье в полном порядке. Тогда в чем же дело?

programme.title: Вечер
programme.desc: "Вечер" - это самые интересные и важные события, за которыми следит команда журналистов "Настоящего времени". Мы не бежим за новостями, а находим их для вас. Мы показываем все точки зрения и рассказываем обо всем, что случилось в конце рабочего дня. С понедельника по пятницу.

programme.title: Мосты Немцова
programme.sub-title: "Не справишься — сниму". Из активиста в губернаторы
programme.desc: 30 ноября 1991 года Ельцин подписал указ о назначении Бориса Немцова главой администрации Нижегородской области. Немцову тогда было 32 года. В области тогда был голод и разруха - приходилось разворачивать полевые кухни, но молодому губернатору удалось сделать успешные шаги к рыночной экономике. Про прогрессивную область заговорили не только в России, но и во всем мире: в июле 1993 года Нижний Новгород с визитом посетила "железная леди" Маргарет Тэтчер. Но потом началась Первая чеченская война и в область стали приходить гробы и похоронки.

programme.title: Америка
programme.desc: Ежедневная информационная программа "Америка" - новости, аналитика, репортажи о США, России и странах постсоветского пространства, которые готовит команда журналистов "Голоса Америки".

programme.title: За час до рассвета
programme.desc: 1946 год. Капитан разведки Журавлёв возвращается в родной город. Единственное место, где он готов работать - милиция. Под руководством майора Шумейко по прозвищу Сатана решать поставленные задачи придётся любой ценой. Журавлёв предлагает свой план, как выйти на банду преступника по прозвищу Клещ, которая орудует в городе. Шумейко даёт добро капитану на его реализацию. Но война, идущая в мирное время, ещё запутаннее, чем война, которая только закончилась.

programme.title: За час до рассвета
programme.desc: 1946 год. Капитан разведки Журавлёв возвращается в родной город. Единственное место, где он готов работать - милиция. Под руководством майора Шумейко по прозвищу Сатана решать поставленные задачи придётся любой ценой. Журавлёв предлагает свой план, как выйти на банду преступника по прозвищу Клещ, которая орудует в городе. Шумейко даёт добро капитану на его реализацию. Но война, идущая в мирное время, ещё запутаннее, чем война, которая только закончилась.

Также расскажем о забытых традициях в Центральной Азии, а также попробуем блюда ЦА, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Ootame kulla
programme.desc: Абсолютное большинство туристов, приезжающих в Грузию, отмечают, что самое ценное для них - это возможность общения. Знаменитое грузинское гостеприимство во многом определяет отношение гостей к стране. Джаба Хвичия - человек, который уверен, что "ни что так не сближает людей, как застолье". Именно за традиционным грузинским столом можно узнать о культуре народа очень многое. И тут, как утверждают, Джабе нет равных.

programme.title: Tutred-emad
programme.desc: Kristina kallim Nikita korraldab sillalt benji-huppe, mille kaigus selgub, et Kristina ootab talt last. Kristina otsustab sunnitada, kuid selles toetab teda esialgu vaid ta oma isa.

programme.title: Tutred-emad
programme.desc: Nikita tahab veenda Kristinat, et tal on vara lapsevanemaks saada ja ostab talle imiku-simulatsiooniga nuku. Siis toob kontserdipiletid, et panna Kristina valiku ette. Kristina kuulab ema nõu ja otsustab mitte sunnitada. Kuid viimasel minutil tormab arstiikabinetti Nikita.

programme.title: Екатерина. Фавориты
programme.desc: Предательство Корсакова больно ранит Екатерину. Тем временем крымский хан Шагин-Гирей казнил турецкого посла и ищет сближения с Россией. Екатерина решает пригласить хана в Петербург. После смотра фаворитов на балу императрица понимает, что кандидаты, которые добиваются ее внимания на самом деле - марионетки ее вельмож и советников.

programme.title: Екатерина. Фавориты
programme.desc: Екатерина пока не готова впустить Ланского в свое сердце. Но разрешает ему сопровождать себя во время поездки к сыну Павлу в Гатчину. Императрица узнает, что Его Высочество создает собственную армию - гатчинские полки. Екатерина назначает Ланского флигель-адъютантом, она намеревается вырастить из него настоящего советника.

programme.title: Avastamata Aasia
programme.desc: Что вы знаете о Центральной Азии? То, что эти страны когда-то входили в состав СССР, и то, что люди сейчас там живут бедно, живут в кишлаках и ездят на ослах, мечтают переехать в Россию и работать там, пьют только зеленый чай и едят плов и мясо, притесняют людей других национальностей? Мы решили развеять самые распространенные мифы о Центральной Азии, а также рассказать о забытых традициях и блюдах, которые шокируют иностранцев, а иногда даже самих местных.

programme.title: Ootame kulla
programme.desc: "Ждем в гости" с Зурабом Двали - это уникальный кулинарно-этнографический телепроект. Ведущий программы путешествует по удивительно красивым и интересным местам, посещая местные достопримечательности, любуясь природой и знакомясь с новыми людьми. Везде гостеприимные хозяева говорят нашим телезрителям: "Ждем в гости!" Вместе с Зурабом Двали вы побываете в разных уголках прекрасной Грузии. В аджарском кафе "Привет из Батума" вам раскроют секрет фирменного салата заведения, директор батумского отеля "Президент-плаза" научит вас готовить осетрину, в самом центре Тбилиси вы узнаете рецепты приготовления традиционных блюд грузинской кухни, в одном из узбекских ресторанов столицы вас посвятят в тайны узбекской кухни, вы побываете на празднике урожая Тбилисоба, винном заводе №1, на даче знаменитой грузинской певицы Ирмы Сохадзе, в Мцхете и Кахетии...

programme.title: Третья жизнь Дарьи Кирилловны
programme.desc: Как многие провинциалы, Даша сама пробивалась в Москве и за несколько лет встала у руля модного архитектурного агентства. Столичная жизнь превратила скромную Дашу в Дарью Кирилловну, и даже муж побаивается ее буйного нрава. Но в один миг судьба героини круто меняется. После страшного нападения Даша приходит в себя в чужом городе и не может вспомнить ничего о своей прошлой жизни…

programme.title: Третья жизнь Дарьи Кирилловны
programme.desc: Как многие провинциалы, Даша сама пробивалась в Москве и за несколько лет встала у руля модного архитектурного агентства. Столичная жизнь превратила скромную Дашу в Дарью Кирилловну, и даже муж побаивается ее буйного нрава. Но в один миг судьба героини круто меняется. programme.desc: Как многие провинциалы, Даша сама пробивалась в Москве и за несколько лет встала у руля модного архитектурного агентства. После страшного нападения Даша приходит в себя в чужом городе и не может вспомнить ничего о своей прошлой жизни…

programme.title: Провинциальный детектив
programme.desc: Во время поездки на работу на судью города Мухина Элеонору Брянцеву совершено покушение. Она находится в больнице в тяжелом состоянии. Водитель такси Николай погиб. Татьяна и Ольга пытаются выяснить действительно ли покушались на Элеонору и случайна ли смерть таксиста.

programme.title: Olga
programme.desc: Ольга и Гриша везут Ярика к маме. Лена пытается избавиться от своего спасителя — Виктора. А Юрген в попытках найти прощение Чичи и Наташи обращается за помощью к дядьке Чичи.

programme.title: Olga
programme.desc: Узнав, что Саша и Тимофей расстались, Ольга решает вразумить сына. Аню и компанию поиски приводят в родной город Льва. А Юрген пытается самостоятельно совладать со своим сумасшествием и отказывается от помощи друзей.

programme.title: Hudson ja Rex
programme.desc: Kui Charlie venda suudistatakse tema poksijast konkurendi surmas, peavad Charlie ja tiim arvestama võimalusega, et ta võibki olla suudi.

programme.title: Шаляпин
programme.desc: Кажется, у Фёдора Ивановича есть всё - слава, богатство, большая и крепкая семья. Но неожиданный приезд отца и страшные события "Кровавого воскресенья" заставляют его переосмыслить свою жизнь. Фёдор устраивает большой бесплатный концерт для рабочих и заводит роман с другой женщиной…

programme.title: Вечер
programme.desc: "Вечер" - это самые интересные и важные события, за которыми следит команда журналистов "Настоящего времени". Мы не бежим за новостями, а находим их для вас. Мы показываем все точки зрения и рассказываем обо всем, что случилось в конце рабочего дня. С понедельника по пятницу.

programme.title: Мосты Немцова
programme.sub-title: "Я устал вас защищать". Из губернаторов в правительство
programme.desc: Едва избравшись на второй губернаторский срок в Нижегородской области, Немцов получил предложение, от которого не смог отказаться, и в 1997 году перебрался в Москву, став вице-премьером Российского правительства. В столице он присоединился к младореформаторам, работал от рассвета до заката и его рейтинг в первый год работы был невероятно высоким. Вскоре Немцов становится неудобным и против него разворачивают настоящую информационную войну. За полгода рейтинг одобрения падает до одного процента.

programme.title: Америка
programme.desc: Ежедневная информационная программа "Америка" - новости, аналитика, репортажи о США, России и странах постсоветского пространства, которые готовит команда журналистов "Голоса Америки".

programme.title: За час до рассвета
programme.desc: 1946 год. Капитан разведки Журавлёв возвращается в родной город. Единственное место, где он готов работать - милиция. Под руководством майора Шумейко по прозвищу Сатана решать поставленные задачи придётся любой ценой. Журавлёв предлагает свой план, как выйти на банду преступника по прозвищу Клещ, которая орудует в городе. Шумейко даёт добро капитану на его реализацию. Но война, идущая в мирное время, ещё запутаннее, чем война, которая только закончилась.

programme.title: За час до рассвета
programme.desc: 1946 год. Капитан разведки Журавлёв возвращается в родной город. Единственное место, где он готов работать - милиция.
