programme.title: Suvevaheaeg
programme.desc: Kuus teismelist noort veedavad unustamatu suve muinasjutulises kuurordis. Paraku mitte puhkajatena, vaid hotellis tood rabades. Kuigi toopaevad on pikad ja ulemused karmid, aitab surfamine agedatel lainetel unustada kõik mured ning tanu headele sõpradele laheb aeg lennates.

programme.title: Kidz Megamix
programme.desc: Kõige agedamad, kõige vaadatumad, kõige uuemad muusikavideod teismelistele fannidele.

programme.title: Barbie maagiline seiklus
programme.desc: Malibu Barbie ja Brooklyni Barbie leiavad Malibu rannalt vaikese pegasuse ning asuvad valja selgitama, kus ta kodu on. Otsingute kaigus peavad nad vastu astuma ka Glyphile, kes jahib pegasust, et talt tiivad varastada.

programme.title: Valge delfiin Zoom
programme.desc: Kartmatu 15-aastane poiss Yann ja tema 7-aastane õde Marina elavad koos oma onu Patrickuga troopilisel paradiisisaarel Maotoul. Yanni parim sõber on Zoom, aarmiselt arukas valge delfiin, kellega koos satutakse vapustavatesse seiklustesse.

programme.title: Valge delfiin Zoom
programme.desc: Kartmatu 15-aastane poiss Yann ja tema 7-aastane õde Marina elavad koos oma onu Patrickuga troopilisel paradiisisaarel Maotoul. Yanni parim sõber on Zoom, aarmiselt arukas valge delfiin, kellega koos satutakse vapustavatesse seiklustesse.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, Gnasher ja nende ulemeelikud sõbrad Rubi, JJ, Pirukanagu ja tema lemmikkartul Paul keedavad kokku pooraseid plaane, satuvad kõikvõimalikesse viperustesse ja võtavad vastu iga valjakutse, olgu see nii suur kui tahes.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, Gnasher ja nende ulemeelikud sõbrad Rubi, JJ, Pirukanagu ja tema lemmikkartul Paul keedavad kokku pooraseid plaane, satuvad kõikvõimalikesse viperustesse ja võtavad vastu iga valjakutse, olgu see nii suur kui tahes.

programme.title: Poiss, tudruk, koer, kass, hiir ja juust
programme.desc: Sari raagib uhe tavalise pere seiklustest. Perre kuuluvad uks poiss, uks tudruk, uks koer, uks kass, uks hiir ja uks juustutukk, kes elavad koos uhe katuse all. Midagi ei saa ju valesti minna. Või kas saab?

programme.title: Poiss, tudruk, koer, kass, hiir ja juust
programme.desc: Sari raagib uhe tavalise pere seiklustest. Perre kuuluvad uks poiss, uks tudruk, uks koer, uks kass, uks hiir ja uks juustutukk, kes elavad koos uhe katuse all. Midagi ei saa ju valesti minna. Või kas saab?

programme.title: Sõsarad
programme.desc: Need kaks õde on parimad sõbrad ja samal ajal ka surmavaenlased ehk nad on taiesti tavalised õed. Kui nad midagi tahavad, siis mõtlevad nad selle saamiseks valja eriskummalisi plaane, mille taideviimisel purunevad asjad ja saavad viga inimesed.

programme.title: Hoodie
programme.desc: "Hoodie" on superkangelase lugu taiesti tavalisest poisist, kellel on erakordne parkuuri talent ja õiglustunne. Nuud on ta juba kaks aastat harjutanud parkuurimist Soufianiga, Brusseli parima jaljekutiga. Ta teeb seda salaja, sest tema ema, innukas politseinik, ei kiidaks seda iial heaks. Kui kolm naabruskonna last Flo, Basim ja Kenza avastavad Pieteri talendi ja motivatsiooni, uhinevad nad ootamatuks superkangelaste tiimiks nimega tiim Hoodie. Neid uhendab uks eesmark - vabastada naabruskond ulekohtust.

programme.title: Laagrisse veetud
programme.desc: Noored Rossid naasevad Kikiwaka laagrisse ja avastavad, et kampingumajakesi pole taastatud ja Gladys on kadunud. Nuud tuleb neil valja mõelda, kuidas laste tuju uleval hoida. Lisandunud on uued laagrilised Matteo, Destiny ja Finn.

programme.title: Salaagent KC
programme.desc: Keskkooliõpilane K. C. Cooper on valitsuse uusim salaagent! Ühine temaga, kui ta õpib, et spioonide peres kasvamine tahendab kõigi missioonide jagamist.

programme.title: LEGO DreamZzz
programme.desc: Mateo on taiesti tavaline poiss, kes uhel ool mõistab, et peab hakkama kaitsma unenagusid Õudusunenao kuninga ja tema jõledate mahhinatsioonide eest. Kuid kas tema unenaod on ikka ainult unenaod? Sest hommikul on akitselt olendid Mateo unenaost tegelikkuseks saanud ja palju muudki on muutunud.

programme.title: Hirmus Henry
programme.desc: Henry on uks hirmus poiss, arvavad taiskasvanud. Aga Henry ise ei tee sellest valja. Isegi kui Henry puuab olla oma venna Perfektse Peteri moodi või kaia balletitunnis, on tulemus ikka võrdlemisi hirmus.

programme.title: 100% hunt
programme.desc: Freddy Lupin teab, et tal on olemas kõik vajalik libahuntide eliitpatrulli jaoks. Ta peab lihtsalt võitma koha prestiižikas Howlingtoni akadeemias, hoiduma probleemidest ja lõpetama kooli. Lihtne, eks? VALE! Olla esimene koer ainult libahuntidele mõeldud koolis on raskem, kui Freddy aimata oskas.

programme.title: Sugavik
programme.desc: Nektonite pere elab ulimoodsas allveelaevas Aronnax, millega nad randavad ookeanisugavustes, kus nad avastavad põnevaid saladusi.

programme.title: Kidzone lastehommik - LEGO sõbrad
programme.desc: Ela kaasa Heartlakei keskkoolis tegutsevate sõprade taiesti uutele seiklustele!

programme.title: Kallikarud vallandavad võluvae
programme.desc: Armsad ja heatahtlikud kallikarud elavad seiklusrikast ning toredat elu. Uus seiklus viib nad veidrale maale ning kallikarud peavad tavalisest veelgi enam uksteisele toetuma. Kallikarud jatkavad oma missiooni ning jagavad sõpruse, vapruse ja võluvae abil kogu maailmale hoolimist ja hoolitsemist.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Ta leiab kiiresti uhise keele nii inimeste kui loomadega ja võidab oma rõõmsa ellusuhtumisega nende sudamed. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.desc: Sari raagib uhe tavalise pere seiklustest. Perre kuuluvad uks poiss, uks tudruk, uks koer, uks kass, uks hiir ja uks juustutukk, kes elavad koos uhe katuse all. Midagi ei saa ju valesti minna. Või kas saab?

programme.title: Sõsarad
programme.desc: Need kaks õde on parimad sõbrad ja samal ajal ka surmavaenlased ehk nad on taiesti tavalised õed. Kui nad midagi tahavad, siis mõtlevad nad selle saamiseks valja eriskummalisi plaane, mille taideviimisel purunevad asjad ja saavad viga inimesed.

programme.title: Hoodie
programme.desc: "Hoodie" on superkangelase lugu taiesti tavalisest poisist, kellel on erakordne parkuuri talent ja õiglustunne. Nuud on ta juba kaks aastat harjutanud parkuurimist Soufianiga, Brusseli parima jaljekutiga. Ta teeb seda salaja, sest tema ema, innukas politseinik, ei kiidaks seda iial heaks. Kui kolm naabruskonna last Flo, Basim ja Kenza avastavad Pieteri talendi ja motivatsiooni, uhinevad nad ootamatuks superkangelaste tiimiks nimega tiim Hoodie. Neid uhendab uks eesmark - vabastada naabruskond ulekohtust.

programme.desc: Keskkooliõpilane K. C. Cooper on valitsuse uusim salaagent! Ühine temaga, kui ta õpib, et spioonide peres kasvamine tahendab kõigi missioonide jagamist.

programme.title: Laagrisse veetud
programme.desc: Emma, Ravi ja Zuri Ross suunduvad paevinainud Mainei suvelaagrisse, kus nende vanemad teismeeas kohtusid. Leitud sõprade, armukolmnurga ja laagrihirmude keskel harjuvad nad oma uue ja põneva eluga.

programme.title: 100% hunt
programme.desc: Freddy Lupin teab, et tal on olemas kõik vajalik libahuntide eliitpatrulli jaoks. programme.title: Suvevaheaeg
programme.desc: Kuus teismelist noort veedavad unustamatu suve muinasjutulises kuurordis. Paraku mitte puhkajatena, vaid hotellis tood rabades. Kuigi toopaevad on pikad ja ulemused karmid, aitab surfamine agedatel lainetel unustada kõik mured ning tanu headele sõpradele laheb aeg lennates.

programme.title: Suvevaheaeg

programme.title: Barbie maagiline seiklus

programme.title: Valge delfiin Zoom
programme.desc: Kartmatu 15-aastane poiss Yann ja tema 7-aastane õde Marina elavad koos oma onu Patrickuga troopilisel paradiisisaarel Maotoul. Yanni parim sõber on Zoom, aarmiselt arukas valge delfiin, kellega koos satutakse vapustavatesse seiklustesse.

programme.title: Heidi

programme.desc: Ela kaasa Heartlakei keskkoolis tegutsevate sõprade taiesti uutele seiklustele!

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher
programme.desc: Dennis, Gnasher ja nende ulemeelikud sõbrad Rubi, JJ, Pirukanagu ja tema lemmikkartul Paul keedavad kokku pooraseid plaane, satuvad kõikvõimalikesse viperustesse ja võtavad vastu iga valjakutse, olgu see nii suur kui tahes.

programme.title: Sugavik
programme.desc: Nektonite pere elab ulimoodsas allveelaevas Aronnax, millega nad randavad ookeanisugavustes, kus nad avastavad põnevaid saladusi.

programme.title: Beyblade X
programme.desc: Noor poiss ihkab saada professionaalseks Beybladei mangijaks. Ta soovib jõuda torni nimega X, kus elukutselised bleiderid kokku saavad.

programme.title: Suvevaheaeg
programme.desc: Kuus teismelist noort veedavad unustamatu suve muinasjutulises kuurordis. Paraku mitte puhkajatena, vaid hotellis tood rabades. Kuigi toopaevad on pikad ja ulemused karmid, aitab surfamine agedatel lainetel unustada kõik mured ning tanu headele sõpradele laheb aeg lennates.

programme.title: Suvevaheaeg
programme.desc: Kuus teismelist noort veedavad unustamatu suve muinasjutulises kuurordis. Paraku mitte puhkajatena, vaid hotellis tood rabades. Kuigi toopaevad on pikad ja ulemused karmid, aitab surfamine agedatel lainetel unustada kõik mured ning tanu headele sõpradele laheb aeg lennates.

programme.title: Kidz Megamix
programme.desc: Kõige agedamad, kõige vaadatumad, kõige uuemad muusikavideod teismelistele fannidele.

programme.title: Barbie maagiline seiklus
programme.desc: Malibu Barbie ja Brooklyni Barbie leiavad Malibu rannalt vaikese pegasuse ning asuvad valja selgitama, kus ta kodu on. Otsingute kaigus peavad nad vastu astuma ka Glyphile, kes jahib pegasust, et talt tiivad varastada.

programme.title: Valge delfiin Zoom
programme.desc: Kartmatu 15-aastane poiss Yann ja tema 7-aastane õde Marina elavad koos oma onu Patrickuga troopilisel paradiisisaarel Maotoul. Yanni parim sõber on Zoom, aarmiselt arukas valge delfiin, kellega koos satutakse vapustavatesse seiklustesse.

programme.title: Dennis and Gnasher

programme.title: Jeti seiklused
programme.desc: Teadushuviline Sean ja ulmefann Syndney on naabrilapsed ja parimad sõbrad. Nad saavad kiiresti sõbraks ka hiljuti samale tanavale kolinud Jetiga, kelle perekond on tegelikult parit teiselt planeedilt. Koos randavad nad kosmosesse, kus nad saavad palju uusi teadmisi aja ning ilmaruumi kohta, aga alati jõuavad nad tapselt lõunasoogiks tagasi.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Ta leiab kiiresti uhise keele nii inimeste kui loomadega ja võidab oma rõõmsa ellusuhtumisega nende sudamed. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa on armas ja alati rõõmsameelne põrsaplika, kes elab koos oma vaikese venna Georgei, Emme Põssa ja Issi Põssaga. Peppale meeldib mangida, end põnevalt riidesse panna, valjas kaia ja mudalompides hupata. Ta seiklused lõpevad alati õnnelikult ja suure naeruga.

programme.title: Paprika
programme.desc: Paprika kaksikud Stan ja Olivia naevad uhesugused valja, kuid oma olemuselt on nad vaga erinevad. Nad moodustavad koos pooraselt rõõmsameelse duo, mis pulbitseb energiast ja kujutlusvõimest. Koos sõprade Jeti, Tupsu, Poodiumi ja Magmaga suudavad nad muuta kõige tuhisema igapaevase sundmuse suurejooneliseks seikluseks.

programme.desc: "Dino rantšo" jalgib Cassidy pere seiklusi, kui nad peavad farmi ulmelises, eelajaloolises keskkonnas, kus randavad ringi dinosaurused.

programme.title: Tobot
programme.desc: Pahatahtliku robotarmee kadumisest on moodunud kaks aastat. Kuna Toboteid pole enam vaja lainud, on neist saanud legend. Ryan, Kory ja Dylan on juba viiendas klassis ning Franklin (Ryani ja Kory isa) ja Limo (Dylani isa) juhivad koos autoremonditookoda. Aga kui uus pahalane koos oma robotitega seab linna rahu ohtu, peavad Tobotid uuesti toole asuma.

programme.title: Jonny Jetboy
programme.desc: Jonny Jones on Joneside pere noorim liige. See pere on salamisi superkangelaste pere tuntud nime all Jetfleet. Nagu igas peres, ei saa ka nemad alat hasti labi, aga kui nad kõik koos tegutsevad, ei suuda miski maailmas neid peatada.

programme.title: Gabby nukumaja
programme.desc: Gabby leiab karbist reisiraamatu ja kolm piletit, mis viivad ta reisiseiklusele. Vembukass annab neile enne teele asumist nimekirja asjadest, millest soovib koos oma paberkujuga pilte saada. Gabby ja Pandi lõbutsevad koos DJ Kiskaga lennukis, seilavad koos Kiisunakiga laeval, kihutavad koos Kiisuhaldjaga rongis ja lendavad koos Karbititaga kuumaõhupalliga! Rallinurr aga laulab meile.

programme.title: Kallikarud vallandavad võluvae
programme.desc: Armsad ja heatahtlikud kallikarud elavad seiklusrikast ning toredat elu. Uus seiklus viib nad veidrale maale ning kallikarud peavad tavalisest veelgi enam uksteisele toetuma. programme.title: Jeti seiklused
programme.desc: Teadushuviline Sean ja ulmefann Syndney on naabrilapsed ja parimad sõbrad. Nad saavad kiiresti sõbraks ka hiljuti samale tanavale kolinud Jetiga, kelle perekond on tegelikult parit teiselt planeedilt. Koos randavad nad kosmosesse, kus nad saavad palju uusi teadmisi aja ning ilmaruumi kohta, aga alati jõuavad nad tapselt lõunasoogiks tagasi.

programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Ta leiab kiiresti uhise keele nii inimeste kui loomadega ja võidab oma rõõmsa ellusuhtumisega nende sudamed. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.title: Paprika

programme.title: Badanamu lood
programme.desc: Sarjas kasitsetakse eelkooliealiste laste elu keskseid teemasid nii, et need sisendavad kujutlusvõimet ja imestamist argipaeva. Kogu loo kestel omandavad noored vaatajad olulisi sotsiaalseid, emotsionaalseid ja praktilisi õppetunde.

programme.title: Badanamu lood
programme.desc: Sarjas kasitsetakse eelkooliealiste laste elu keskseid teemasid nii, et need sisendavad kujutlusvõimet ja imestamist argipaeva. Kogu loo kestel omandavad noored vaatajad olulisi sotsiaalseid, emotsionaalseid ja praktilisi õppetunde.

programme.title: Toomas ja sõbrad
programme.desc: Vaikese veduri Toomase ja tema sõprade seiklused.

programme.title: Vikerkaare Ruby
programme.desc: "Vikerkaare Ruby" on lugu tragist ja leidlikust vaikesest tudrukust, kes kaib imevael Vikerkaare kulas, veidral maal, kus elavad tema manguasjad. Seal kehastab Ruby nende aitamiseks erinevate ametite esindajaid.

programme.title: Kallikarud vallandavad võluvae
programme.desc: Armsad ja heatahtlikud kallikarud elavad seiklusrikast ning toredat elu. Uus seiklus viib nad veidrale maale ning kallikarud peavad tavalisest veelgi enam uksteisele toetuma. Kallikarud jatkavad oma missiooni ning jagavad sõpruse, vapruse ja võluvae abil kogu maailmale hoolimist ja hoolitsemist.

programme.title: Kallikarud vallandavad võluvae
programme.desc: Armsad ja heatahtlikud kallikarud elavad seiklusrikast ning toredat elu. Uus seiklus viib nad veidrale maale ning kallikarud peavad tavalisest veelgi enam uksteisele toetuma. Kallikarud jatkavad oma missiooni ning jagavad sõpruse, vapruse ja võluvae abil kogu maailmale hoolimist ja hoolitsemist.

programme.title: Jeti seiklused
programme.desc: Teadushuviline Sean ja ulmefann Syndney on naabrilapsed ja parimad sõbrad. Nad saavad kiiresti sõbraks ka hiljuti samale tanavale kolinud Jetiga, kelle perekond on tegelikult parit teiselt planeedilt. Koos randavad nad kosmosesse, kus nad saavad palju uusi teadmisi aja ning ilmaruumi kohta, aga alati jõuavad nad tapselt lõunasoogiks tagasi.

programme.title: Jeti seiklused
programme.desc: Teadushuviline Sean ja ulmefann Syndney on naabrilapsed ja parimad sõbrad. Nad saavad kiiresti sõbraks ka hiljuti samale tanavale kolinud Jetiga, kelle perekond on tegelikult parit teiselt planeedilt. programme.title: Heidi
programme.desc: Heidi on vaike soakas tudruk, kes elab koos oma vanaisaga kõrgel Šveitsi magedes. Ta leiab kiiresti uhise keele nii inimeste kui loomadega ja võidab oma rõõmsa ellusuhtumisega nende sudamed. Heidi õpib austama teisi inimesi ja saab teda, kui oluline on omada haid sõpru, kes aitavad sind labi eluraskuste.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa on armas ja alati rõõmsameelne põrsaplika, kes elab koos oma vaikese venna Georgei, Emme Põssa ja Issi Põssaga. Peppale meeldib mangida, end põnevalt riidesse panna, valjas kaia ja mudalompides hupata. Ta seiklused lõpevad alati õnnelikult ja suure naeruga.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa on armas ja alati rõõmsameelne põrsaplika, kes elab koos oma vaikese venna Georgei, Emme Põssa ja Issi Põssaga. Peppale meeldib mangida, end põnevalt riidesse panna, valjas kaia ja mudalompides hupata. Ta seiklused lõpevad alati õnnelikult ja suure naeruga.

programme.title: Põrsas Peppa
programme.desc: Peppa on armas ja alati rõõmsameelne põrsaplika, kes elab koos oma vaikese venna Georgei, Emme Põssa ja Issi Põssaga. Peppale meeldib mangida, end põnevalt riidesse panna, valjas kaia ja mudalompides hupata. Ta seiklused lõpevad alati õnnelikult ja suure naeruga.

programme.title: Master i Margarita
programme.desc: Москва, 1930-е годы. Популярный драматург обвиняется в антисоветчине: спектакль по его пьесе отменяют, а самого его выгоняют из союза литераторов. В не самый лучший момент своей жизни он встречает глубоко несчастную в браке красавицу Маргариту и начинает новый роман, героями которого становятся люди из его окружения, в том числе — мистический персонаж Воланд, списанный со знакомого иностранца.

programme.title: Приключения Тома Сойера и Гекльберри Финна
programme.desc: Экранизация самого знаменитого романа американского писателя Марка Твена "Приключения Тома Сойера". Маленькие, но отважные герои разыскивают клад, становятся "пиратами", вступают в опасную схватку с индейцем Джо. Но, самое главное в этой истории - то, что они учатся быть верными друзьями и добрыми людьми.

programme.title: Завтрак у папы
programme.desc: У молодого, привлекательного и самовлюбленного Саши Титова в жизни, на первый взгляд, все сложилось как нельзя лучше: он успешный креативный директор рекламного агентства и полностью удовлетворен ни к чему не обязывающими отношениями с коллегой Оксаной Тарелкиной. Но однажды утром на пороге своего пентхауса Саша встречает милую десятилетнюю девчушку Алю, которая представляется его дочкой. Ворвавшись в жизнь Саши, смышленая и любознательная Аля серьезно намерена надолго в ней обосноваться. Но готов ли Саша принять все сюрпризы, приготовленные судьбой, и в корне изменить привычную холостяцкую жизнь?

programme.title: Vasakukaeline
programme.desc: Billy "The Great" Hope (Jake Gyllenhaal) on valitsev poksi maailmameister, kelle tunnuseks on brutaalselt rundav võitlusstiil, mille aluseks on teda noorusest peale tagant kihutanud meeleheitlik puudlemine armastuse, raha ja kuulsuse poole. Viimaks on mees tipus nii ringis kui valjaspool seda, tal on armastav pere, ilus kodu ja majanduslik kindlustatus. Kuni see kõik uhel õhtul kokku kukub, paisates Billy musta auku, millest naib olevat võimatu valja rabeleda. Film ei sobi alaealistele.

programme.title: Приключения Тома Сойера и Гекльберри Финна
programme.desc: Экранизация самого знаменитого романа американского писателя Марка Твена "Приключения Тома Сойера". Маленькие, но отважные герои разыскивают клад, становятся "пиратами", вступают в опасную схватку с индейцем Джо. Но, самое главное в этой истории - то, что они учатся быть верными друзьями и добрыми людьми.

programme.title: Gudbai, Ameerika
programme.desc: Ameerikas elab palju venelasi. Kui vaga nad ka ei puuaks varasemat elu unustada ja uues kohas sisse elada, ei kipu see õnnestuma. Võib ju ara sõita kull, kuid Venemaad maha raputada ei ole võimalik.

programme.title: Моя ужасная сестра
programme.desc: Соня с мамой переезжают к чудесному маминому другу, который сделал ей предложение. Скоро у десятилетней девочки будет новый папа. Но по приезду их ждёт сюрприз - дочка Лена, которую мама привезла жить к папе, потому что ей срочно нужно улететь в Африку. Новоиспечённых сестёр не устраивает перспектива жить в одной комнате, у каждой свои претензии к родителям. Девчонки решают разлучить влюблённых. Фантазии на разные козни у них - хоть отбавляй.

programme.title: Seitse õhtusooki
programme.desc: Parast viieaastast kooselu laguneb abikaasade suhe koost. Kui naine palub lahutust, saab peakangelane aru, et pole valmis lahedast inimest kaotama. Ta veenab naist osalema testis, mille oleks justkui ise valja tootanud. Suhete taastamise test kannab nime "Seitse õhtusooki". Kokkuleppe jargi saab naine lahutuse siis, kui ta ka testi jarel oma kavatsust ei muuda. Asi naib lihtne: paar peab seitse korda koos õhtustama. Naine, kes on kindel, et mees katsub vaid lahkuminekut edasi lukata, jaab nõusse. Ent siis selgub, et iga õhtusook on paras katsumus.

programme.title: Страна Саша
programme.desc: 17-летний Саша не может определиться, куда поступать, и избегает серьезных отношений с девушками. В своей нерешительности он винит отца, бросившего его в раннем детстве. Знакомство с необычной девушкой Женей и встреча с отцом заставляют его повзрослеть.

programme.title: Фея
programme.desc: Создатель лучших игр в виртуальной реальности уверен, что контролирует всё в своей жизни. Но случайная встреча с молодой активисткой открывает ему глаза на то, что мир намного шире и сложнее его представлений.

programme.title: Master i Margarita
programme.desc: Москва, 1930-е годы. Популярный драматург обвиняется в антисоветчине: спектакль по его пьесе отменяют, а самого его выгоняют из союза литераторов. programme.title: Mirāža
programme.desc: Телесериал по мотивам романа Дж.Х.Чейза "Весь мир в кармане". Оказавшись в жизненном тупике, герои фильма решаются на дерзкое ограбление: похищение бронированной машины с огромной суммой денег. Каждый из них верит, что большие деньги принесут ему свободу и счастье. Кажется, весь мир у них в кармане. Но дальше начинается непредвиденное...

programme.title: Seitse õhtusooki
programme.desc: Parast viieaastast kooselu laguneb abikaasade suhe koost. Kui naine palub lahutust, saab peakangelane aru, et pole valmis lahedast inimest kaotama. Ta veenab naist osalema testis, mille oleks justkui ise valja tootanud. Suhete taastamise test kannab nime "Seitse õhtusooki". Kokkuleppe jargi saab naine lahutuse siis, kui ta ka testi jarel oma kavatsust ei muuda. Asi naib lihtne: paar peab seitse korda koos õhtustama. Naine, kes on kindel, et mees katsub vaid lahkuminekut edasi lukata, jaab nõusse. Ent siis selgub, et iga õhtusook on paras katsumus.

programme.title: Страна Саша
programme.desc: 17-летний Саша не может определиться, куда поступать, и избегает серьезных отношений с девушками. В своей нерешительности он винит отца, бросившего его в раннем детстве. Знакомство с необычной девушкой Женей и встреча с отцом заставляют его повзрослеть.

programme.title: Armastab, ei armasta
programme.desc: Ees ootavad Aleksei ja Aljona pulmad. Kõik oleks tore, kui Aleksei poleks kihluse eelõhtul tuttavaks saanud tuntud ajakirjaniku Iraga. Ira ei mahu kuidagi Aleksei tavaparase elu raamidesse. Ta toob Aleksei ellu kaose. Aljona aga on naiivne neiu, kes armastab Alekseid sellisena, nagu too on, ja unistab tema naiseks saamisest. Ira seiklushimu ja valmidus meeletuteks tegudeks panevad Aleksei mõistma, et temagi elu võiks olla palju eredam. Kuid kas ta ikka on valmis seiklusteks, kui panuseks on õnnelik tulevik Aljonaga?

programme.title: Окно в Париж
programme.desc: Учитель музыки Чижов, проживающий в питерской коммуналке, всю жизнь мечтал попасть в свободный западный мир. И вот его мечта сбывается. После изрядного подпития обитатели коммуналки открывают окно... в Париж, через которое и началось нашествие наших людей на берега Сены и злоключения французских "гостей" на берегах Невы...

programme.title: Mul ei ole valus
programme.desc: Noored on tais elujõudu ja energiat, neil on annet. Naine on noorusele vaatamata elust tudinud. Ta aitab noortel arhitektidel oma andeid realiseerida, uks neist suudab ta uuesti armastama panna...

programme.title: Фея
programme.desc: Создатель лучших игр в виртуальной реальности уверен, что контролирует всё в своей жизни. Но случайная встреча с молодой активисткой открывает ему глаза на то, что мир намного шире и сложнее его представлений.

programme.title: Karjasekirjad
programme.desc: Valguse Tee Vabakoguduse pastor Mart Metsala seletab koos pastor Veikko Võsuga lahti Jeesuse Kristuse jargimise põhialuseid ja kummutab eri muute. Meediagrupi Valguse Tee Vabakogudus ja Eesti Kristliku TV omavahelisel koostool valminud saatesari praktilisest kristlusest.

programme.title: Loomine 21. sajandil
programme.desc: За время, прошедшее со дня опубликования книги Дарвина "Происхождения видов", теория эволюции глубоко укоренилась в сознании людей. Повествования о сотворении всего Всемогущим Творцом кажется людям совершенно несовместимым с современными научными открытиями. Нам со школьной скамьи навязывают мысль о теории эволюции как "завершенную картину" - случай, время и законы природы позаботились о том, чтобы за миллионы лет постепенно развились сегодняшние формы жизни. В действительности же растущее число естественнонаучных открытий указывает на то, что эволюционная теория была слишком поспешно принята за факт.

programme.title: Tee Jumala riiki. Jentezen Franklin
programme.desc: Путь в Царство Божье. Пастор Джентезен Франклин. Его послания, пробуждают и созидают.

programme.title: Klubi 700
programme.desc: Saatesari, mis kajastab kristliku maailma uudiseid ja põnevaid ning julgustavaid lugusid inimeste eludest ule terve maailma.

programme.title: Teistsugune maailm. Taimor Kunnberg
programme.desc: Автор программы Таймор Куннберг ведёт беседу с интересными людьми о действии Бога в их жизни.

programme.title: See on uleloomulik
programme.desc: Teleevangelist Sid Roth on messiaanlik juut, kes kohtus Jeesus Naatsaretlasega uleloomulikul viisil 1972. aastal. Jutusaade keskendub kristluse uleloomulikele kogemustele. Igas saates intervjueeritakse kristlasi, kes on kogenud imesid ja kel on vaga isiklikke kohtumisi Jumalaga.

programme.title: Loomine 21. sajandil
programme.desc: За время, прошедшее со дня опубликования книги Дарвина "Происхождения видов", теория эволюции глубоко укоренилась в сознании людей. programme.desc: Путь в Царство Божье. Пастор Джентезен Франклин. Его послания, пробуждают и созидают.

programme.title: Loomine 21. sajandil
programme.desc: За время, прошедшее со дня опубликования книги Дарвина "Происхождения видов", теория эволюции глубоко укоренилась в сознании людей. Повествования о сотворении всего Всемогущим Творцом кажется людям совершенно несовместимым с современными научными открытиями. Нам со школьной скамьи навязывают мысль о теории эволюции как "завершенную картину" - случай, время и законы природы позаботились о том, чтобы за миллионы лет постепенно развились сегодняшние формы жизни. В действительности же растущее число естественнонаучных открытий указывает на то, что эволюционная теория была слишком поспешно принята за факт.

programme.title: See on uleloomulik
programme.desc: Teleevangelist Sid Roth on messiaanlik juut, kes kohtus Jeesus Naatsaretlasega uleloomulikul viisil 1972. aastal. Jutusaade keskendub kristluse uleloomulikele kogemustele. Igas saates intervjueeritakse kristlasi, kes on kogenud imesid ja kel on vaga isiklikke kohtumisi Jumalaga.

programme.title: Karjasekirjad
programme.desc: Valguse Tee Vabakoguduse pastor Mart Metsala seletab koos pastor Veikko Võsuga lahti Jeesuse Kristuse jargimise põhialuseid ja kummutab eri muute. Meediagrupi Valguse Tee Vabakogudus ja Eesti Kristliku TV omavahelisel koostool valminud saatesari praktilisest kristlusest.

programme.title: Alexander Ekman, "Hammer"
programme.desc: Julge, ettearvamatu ja uuenduslik. Balletitantsija ja koreograaf Alexander Ekman kritiseerib humoorikal moel meie tanapaeva maailma, mis paljude jaoks tahendab vaid enesest jaetavat kuvandit. Moodne elu toob kaasa inimese allakaigu, kui algselt uhtne kogukond muutub uha individualistlikumaks ja egoistlikumaks. Ekman pilab kaasaja vaarastunud vaartusi, abiks Goteborgi ooperiteatri balletitrupp.

programme.title: Strauss
programme.sub-title: Strauss: An Alpine symphony - DSO Berlin,Robin Ticciati, Reinhold Messner
programme.desc: Deutsches Symphonie-Orchester Berlin, Robin Ticciati (conductor) Reinhold Messner (narrator) Frederic Wake-Walker (concept and director) Richard Strauss 1864 - 1949 Eine Alpensinfonie Berlin, Tempodrom, 2021 Recorded at Berlins Tempodrom, the Deutsche Symphonie-Orchester Berlin and its chief conductor Robin Ticciati present Richard Strausss "An Alpine Symphony" as a musical and philosophical mountain hike with the legendary mountaineer Reinhold Messner. The concert leads us through the Alps, lets the audience pass flowering meadows en route, through thickets and underbrush, over mountain pastures and glaciers to the summit, and finally the descent surrounded by thunderstorms. Messner provides insights into the physical and psychological borderline experiences of his mountain ascents and speaks about extreme situations, the perception of nature, and his mental state on the night before departure, during the conquest of the peak, during the long, onerous descent and the exhausted, contented return home. Directed by Andreas Morell

programme.title: Rachmaninov revisited
programme.desc: Rachmaninov revisited Celebrated in his day not only as a great composer, Sergei Rachmaninov was also admired as an outstanding pianist who was a peerless interpreter of his own works including the piano concerti and the Rhapsody on a Theme by Paganini. It is well known that he was in effect the sole pianist capable of performing his most demanding Third Piano Concerto and his performances and recording of the concerto came to be considered as the definitive ones. The relationship between performance, interpretation, and Rachmaninovs own life is addressed in this film by young pianists. They explore the evolution of interpretation over the past few decades with brief excerpts of recordings by Rachmaninov as contrasted with contemporary performances by todays well-known young pianists as they comment on the differences (or similarities) of their approach. Directed by Peter Rosen

programme.title: McCoy Tyner Trio live at Estival Lugano
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. McCoy Tyners first main exposure came with Benny Golson, being the first pianist in Golsons and Art Farmers Jazztet. Hes also known for his work with the John Coltrane Quartet. Tyners style is easily comparable to Coltranes maximalist style of saxophone. Though a member of Coltranes group, he was never overshadowed by the saxophonist, but complemented and even inspired Coltranes open-minded approach. McCoy Tyner is considered one of the most influential jazz pianists of the 20th century, an honour he earned both with Coltrane and in his years of performing following Coltranes death.

programme.title: Carla Bley Sextet - Lugano Jazz Estival
programme.desc: Since 1977, Estival is a summer jazz festival in Switzerland, Lugano. Estival offers a thrilling and particularly surprising line-up that explores the rich world of contemporary music whilst promoting the understanding of different cultures, tolerance, and co-existence. Discover the special bond between pianist Carla Bley and bassist Steve Swallow. The two have performed in the same bands since the 60s and have been romantic partners for more than two decades. Watching them perform is the definition of musical telepathy. Together with musicians Wayne Krantz, Victor Lewis, Larry Willis, and Don Alias, they form an amazing sextet at Estival in 1986.

programme.title: Die groSSen Musikrivalen
programme.desc: Rivalry in Music - Furtwangler vs. Toscanini Two men without whom the profession of conductor would not be what it is today. Two men who couldnt be more different from each other: Arturo Toscanini and Wilhelm Furtwangler. The former was rigorously faithful to the musical score, the latter conducted with radical subjectivity. In 1931 they both conducted at the Bayreuth Festival - for the first and last time. Soon the polite rivalry turned into bitter enmity. Both men were forced to take a stand on the regimes in their respective countries - and chose radically different paths. Toscanini, "the dictator", bravely challenged Mussolini; Furtwangler, a conservative, meanwhile proclaimed that art is always apolitical and reluctantly made a pact with the Nazis. The documentary not only opens up the different musical universes of the two great conductors by retracing their careers in Milan, Bayreuth and New York, but also raises a question that is more topical than ever: what has art to do with politics? Directed by Thomas von Steinaecker 2020

programme.title: Richter, the Enigma
programme.desc: Richter, the Enigma Prokofievs 9th Sonata was dedicated to him, he played at Stalins funeral with Oistrakh and Rostropovitch and accompanied Schwarzkopf and Fischer-Dieskau: Sviatoslav Richter was THE Soviet pianist par excellence. This portrait, illustrated with rare and unpublished archival documents from the 1950s to the artists death, gives a view of life in Soviet Russia from the perspective of one of the greatest and yet most enigmatic world pianists. Directed by Bruno Monsaingeon 1997

programme.title: Rachmaninov revisited
programme.desc: Rachmaninov revisited Celebrated in his day not only as a great composer, Sergei Rachmaninov was also admired as an outstanding pianist who was a peerless interpreter of his own works including the piano concerti and the Rhapsody on a Theme by Paganini. It is well known that he was in effect the sole pianist capable of performing his most demanding Third Piano Concerto and his performances and recording of the concerto came to be considered as the definitive ones. The relationship between performance, interpretation, and Rachmaninovs own life is addressed in this film by young pianists. They explore the evolution of interpretation over the past few decades with brief excerpts of recordings by Rachmaninov as contrasted with contemporary performances by todays well-known young pianists as they comment on the differences (or similarities) of their approach. Directed by Peter Rosen

programme.title: Ridiculousness
programme.desc: Rob Dydrek takes the funniest amateur internet videos from the Internet and compiles them into an episode of edgy, hilarious and unforgettable television. Rob and his panellists add mock commentary to complete the viral videos, usually involving failed do-it-yourself attempts at stunts. With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Behind the Music
programme.desc: The iconic franchise is back and better than ever in a new format bringing both brand-new episodes featuring new artists, as well as a remastered series of updated classic episodes. The award-winning series, which was nominated for three consecutive Primetime Emmys, continues the groundbreaking legacy of intimately connecting fans to the most important musical stories of our time. New episodes feature a select group of artists to share their stories through a cutting-edge interactive experience. Artists have the opportunity to react to key milestone moments from their life and career through an immersive journey of archival footage and photos. Plus, a unique look at some of the biggest artists of all time, looking back at their original episodes, and sharing the up and downs of their journeys since their last episode. With a fresh look and brand-new perspective, each of the artists stories will also include exclusive stories from celebrities that were deeply inspired by the featured artist.

programme.title: Cribs
programme.sub-title: Chanel West Coast / Stefflon Don/ Scott Disick
programme.desc: MTV CRIBS returns with a whole new vibe and a never before seen look into the everyday and unexpected lifestyles and rituals of your favorite personalities and their families, as they welcome us into their homes for a one of-a-kind exclusive tour.

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Music magazino. Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Music magazino. Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Teen Mom is a spin-off of the MTV documentary series 16 and Pregnant. We are following the stories of four girls from the first season of 16 and Pregnant who are facing the challenges of their first years of motherhood. Each episode interweaves stories of four teenage girls who are navigating the bumpy terrain of adolescence, growing pains, and coming of age - all while facing the responsibility of being a young mother. Each story offers a unique look into the wide variety of challenges young mothers can face: marriage, relationships, family support, or lack thereof, adoption, finances, rumors among the community, graduating high school, starting college, getting (or losing) a job and the daunting and exciting step of moving out of the nest to create their own families. ​

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jade, Kailyn, Leah, Briana and Chelsea navigate parenting, family dynamics, careers and love lives. Through their highs and lows theyve learned that motherhood is doing whats best for their kids, which comes at no easy cost. Over the last few seasons, the Teen Moms have been tested over and over again, by baby daddy drama and struggles with family members. But, theyve put on brave faces and absorbed the pressure, trying to be strong and set the best examples for their kids. This cycle, the pent-up stress from years of dealing with deadbeat dads, unstable parents, and lying exes has reached its max and needs release. This burst of energy (and emotions) - now in the form of tense confrontations, public arguments and anxiety attacks - threatens the progress the women have made in recent years. On top of it all, the moms must face difficult decisions when the spread of COVID- 19 threatens the health and safety of their families. Will the explosive drama leave permanent relationship scars, or will the Moms avoid burns and push forward to their next chapters free and clear?

programme.title: Valede võrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Thousands of young women in America dream of becoming cheerleaders for their local football franchise. In this reality series, we follow the girls with a chance to achieve their dreams and become a member of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. The auditions begin with hundreds of eager cheerleaders who are put through their paces in a vigorous training camp by former US Army drill sergeant and founder of Boot Camp Fitness, Jay Johnson. Overseeing proceedings is director of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, Kelli McGonagill Finglass, and head of choreography, Judy Trammell, both of whom were members of the cheerleading squad in the 1980s. Not only are the girls tested on their fitness; they must also prove they know their stuff when it comes to football. The girls are judged by a group of experts and the squad is trimmed down to 36 cheerleaders, who perform at the first home game of the season.

programme.title: Help! Im in a Secret Relationship!
programme.desc: After meeting on a dating site, Macky thought he finally met the love of his life, but after three years of marriage, hes yet to meet any of his wifes family members. Macky is on a mission to find out why hes being hidden.

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.sub-title: He Proposed to Both of Us
programme.desc: Leila, a model from Switzerland, was swept off her feet when she first met West four years ago. But lately West has been moving differently, leading Leila to believe that her dream man might be stepping out on her.

With Dyrdeks energetic, unique and infectious energy, Ridiculousness will have you laughing out loud not only at the hilarious mess-ups by the videos, but also by his commentary. Ridiculousness producers, as well as the shows network, MTV, do not accept viewer submitted content and add a disclaimer at the beginning and after to reduce any injuries of viewers attempting the dangerous stunts featured within the show. Ridiculousness was first aired in 2011.

programme.title: Jersey Shore
programme.desc: The Jersey Shore OGs return for a spin off series that sees them get up to their old antics on holiday. Heading of on vacation together for the month, see if the cast are still up for a Blast in a Glass or if theyve mellowed out now theyre supposed to be real adults. With a wedding on the cards and an ongoing court case, will they even have time to Jersey Turnpike? Reunite with the OGs again and get an update on how life after the Shore is treating them, over ten years since they first burst onto our screens.

programme.title: Teen Mom UK
programme.desc: This reality show follows the journeys of four teenage girls, and their journeys into motherhood. We follow the trials and tribulations they face as they reach a new milestone in their life; entering motherhood. There will be some lows but also the most incredible highs, as with any new parent. They will be learning on the job, and the show follows them every step of the way, looking at how their relationships, education, and financial situations change, too.

programme.title: M is for Music
programme.desc: Music magazino. Join us for a look at the hottest hits of the moment.

programme.title: Teen Mom 2
programme.desc: Jade, Kailyn, Leah, Briana and Chelsea navigate parenting, family dynamics, careers and love lives. Through their highs and lows theyve learned that motherhood is doing whats best for their kids, which comes at no easy cost. Over the last few seasons, the Teen Moms have been tested over and over again, by baby daddy drama and struggles with family members. But, theyve put on brave faces and absorbed the pressure, trying to be strong and set the best examples for their kids. This cycle, the pent-up stress from years of dealing with deadbeat dads, unstable parents, and lying exes has reached its max and needs release. This burst of energy (and emotions) - now in the form of tense confrontations, public arguments and anxiety attacks - threatens the progress the women have made in recent years. On top of it all, the moms must face difficult decisions when the spread of COVID- 19 threatens the health and safety of their families. Will the explosive drama leave permanent relationship scars, or will the Moms avoid burns and push forward to their next chapters free and clear?

programme.title: Valede võrgustik
programme.desc: How do young people whove embraced the digital age find love? Often by connecting online with others theyve never met in person before. These days, typing on iPhones has replaced the dinner date, while emailing through Facebook often substitutes for face-to-face conversations. The problem - that cute guy you may be falling in love with could be lying about who he really is. Now, from the producers of the hit feature documentary, Catfish, comes a new MTV series that brings together couples whove interacted solely through LCD screens. Over the course of months theyve supposedly fallen in love -- but what will happen when they meet in real life for the first time? With the guidance and help of Nev Schulman, the star of the original Catfish, in each episode, a hopeful romantic partner will go on an emotional trip to discover the truth about their significant other. Is he who he says he is? And if so, will love truly blossom?

programme.title: Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders
programme.desc: Thousands of young women in America dream of becoming cheerleaders for their local football franchise. In this reality series, we follow the girls with a chance to achieve their dreams and become a member of the Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders. The auditions begin with hundreds of eager cheerleaders who are put through their paces in a vigorous training camp by former US Army drill sergeant and founder of Boot Camp Fitness, Jay Johnson. Overseeing proceedings is director of Dallas Cowboys Cheerleaders, Kelli McGonagill Finglass, and head of choreography, Judy Trammell, both of whom were members of the cheerleading squad in the 1980s. Not only are the girls tested on their fitness; they must also prove they know their stuff when it comes to football. The girls are judged by a group of experts and the squad is trimmed down to 36 cheerleaders, who perform at the first home game of the season.

programme.desc: Caught in the Act: Unfaithful tracks host Tami Roman as she sets out on a mission to empower suspicious lovers to catch their cheating partners in the act.

programme.title: Real World/Road Rules Challenge
programme.desc: This thirty-fifth season of the MTV reality competition series The Challenge sees members The Real World, Are You the One?, Big Brother, Celebrity Big Brother UK, The Amazing Race, Survivor, Geordie Shore, Ex on the Beach, Shipwrecked and Survival of the Fittest go head-to-head in a bid to secure the 1 million dollar prize. The competitors participate in daily challenges and can be nominated to take part in the elimination round where they battle against another adversary to avoid being sent home. The remaining combatants endure a harrowing final challenge which pushes them to the limits of their strength and determination.

programme.title: Behind the Music
programme.desc: The iconic franchise is back and better than ever in a new format bringing both brand-new episodes featuring new artists, as well as a remastered series of updated classic episodes. The award-winning series, which was nominated for three consecutive Primetime Emmys, continues the groundbreaking legacy of intimately connecting fans to the most important musical stories of our time. New episodes feature a select group of artists to share their stories through a cutting-edge interactive experience. Artists have the opportunity to react to key milestone moments from their life and career through an immersive journey of archival footage and photos. Plus, a unique look at some of the biggest artists of all time, looking back at their original episodes, and sharing the up and downs of their journeys since their last episode. With a fresh look and brand-new perspective, each of the artists stories will also include exclusive stories from celebrities that were deeply inspired by the featured artist.

programme.title: Doktor Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Snakes In the City Compilations
programme.desc: Simon and Sioux are amazed by the respect Indian locals have for their venomous scaled neighbors. The calls are pouring in, and Snake Shyam helps rescue a deadly Russells viper tangled in netting. Shyams son, Surya, is breaking concrete steps to help Simon and Sioux finally capture a rat snake. Then, the duo teams with Gowri Shanker to catch and release not one but two enormous king cobras.

programme.title: Blood Rivals
programme.desc: The brute force and collective strategy of buffalo is necessary as one breeding herd fends off relentless attacks from the local lion pride.

programme.title: Born in Africa
programme.desc: Born in Africa is a documentary following the stories of newborns in five animal families in the African savanna, from their first steps to the moment they become independent. These little lions, cheetahs, hyenas, meerkats and jackals must face many challenges along the way, as their mothers do everything to protect them in these most vulnerable stages of life. Watch them as they grow and learn how to move and get by in the wilderness in this intimate portrayal of family dynamics in the natural world.

programme.title: Born in Africa

Watch them as they grow and learn how to move and get by in the wilderness in this intimate portrayal of family dynamics in the natural world.

programme.title: Africas Wild Side
programme.desc: This three-part docu-series takes a look at some of Botswanas most iconic and fascinating wildlife as they strive to survive and rasie their families. Each episode uses spectacular footage to focus on a particular aspect of the creatures struggle for life. One of the main driving forces in animal behaviour is the desire to procreate and ensure the continuity of the species and this is evident in the battles that males participate in for the right to mate with females. However, parenting skills can vary enormously with some animals being prepared to give up their own lives for their offspring while others are revealed to pose the greatest threat. The show also examines how the animals impact on the landscape by building paths and constructing homes.

programme.title: Indias Wild Leopards
programme.desc: Follow wildlife cameraman Sandesh Kadur into some of Indias most challenging and isolated regions on his mission to discover the secretive lives of Indias Secret Leopards.

programme.title: Born in Africa
programme.desc: Born in Africa is a documentary following the stories of newborns in five animal families in the African savanna, from their first steps to the moment they become independent. These little lions, cheetahs, hyenas, meerkats and jackals must face many challenges along the way, as their mothers do everything to protect them in these most vulnerable stages of life. Watch them as they grow and learn how to move and get by in the wilderness in this intimate portrayal of family dynamics in the natural world.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols need to break ground for a new outbuilding that will house incoming livestock and Charles has dreamt up an outrageous idea of what that structure can be - and it just may be just crazy enough to work. At the auction, the Pols are hoping to purchase sheep and cows, but the skyrocketing bids threaten their big plans.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The bidding is live at the large animal auction! The Pols are working towards their goal of bringing home sheep and cows to their farm. Any animals they win will be delivered to the farm in just three days, so the pressure is on to get the sheep hut finished in time - and there is a ton left to do. Meanwhile, Beth and Charles are concerned about the low activity in their beehives.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: This family farm needs a barn! The Pols are ready to tackle their next big project: preserving and carefully taking down a 100-year-old barn since, with every piece they remove makes the barn weaker and weaker. There is no room for error if they are going to transport these irreplaceable beams back to the farm and restore it to its former glory.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols have reached the most dangerous stage of disassembling the 100-year-old barn: taking down the beams. Then, if all goes well, theyll transport the beams back to the farm. Each part of this process must be carefully orchestrated to protect these irreplaceable beams. Meanwhile, Beth tries training Clovis after he runs away from the farm.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Worlds Creepiest Killers
programme.desc: Giant spiders, voracious blobs and swamp things are the stuff of horror movies - but these creepy killers are real!

programme.title: Wonders of the Ocean
programme.desc: Pacific islands range from coral atolls and smoking volcanoes to pieces of a lost continent. Discover wild stories of adaptation and survival.

programme.title: Wonders of the Ocean
programme.desc: Life in the ocean is a constant battle to eat but not get eaten, to find a mate, and to pass on your genes to the next generation.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals

Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: Africas wild spaces host an incredible array of creatures…creatures who engage in a daily ballet of life and death. Among this myriad of species is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predator skills. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying into their inner sanctums. From the arid Saharan deserts in the north, to the lush plains of the south, to the expansive Nile River, they creep crawl and live where we live, work, and play. This shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, power and skill surpasses all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed them to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met them first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Africas Deadly Dozen.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: India, one of the oldest and culturally rich countries on the planet. Its Its millions of square miles contain six distinct climate zones and sustain nearly a billion people . Living within its arid deserts, lush jungles, and rugged mountains are scores of dangerous species. Among this myriad is an elite group of twelve --an assembly of mammals, reptiles, and arachnids-- equipped with an arsenal of predatory skills. Brilliantly adapted, beautiful to observe, they enthrall and amaze us. Now, witness their magnificence by journeying to their inner sanctums. From the foothills of the Himalayas to the forests of the Sunderbans, Indias deadly dozen creep, crawl, and live where we live, work, and play. The shows climax comes when it reaches the animal whose size, strength or fearsome reputation looms above all others. To best understand this animal, we not only examine the magnificent adaptations that have allowed it to survive and thrive, but hear from someone whos met it first hand…and lived to tell the story. This first-person narrative offers both stunning detail and insight into why this animal is indeed considered one of the deadliest. Theyre beautiful, theyre highly evolved, and theyre dangerousthey are Indias Deadly Dozen.

Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Critter Fixers
programme.desc: Hogs and Hisses. The Docs at Critter Fixer rush to save a foxs leg after a brutal attack and help a Black Labrador Retriever with a severe case of pyometra. Dr. Hodges comes face-to-face with an Albino Chinese Cobra and an African Bush Viper.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Worlds Creepiest Killers
programme.desc: Giant spiders, voracious blobs and swamp things are the stuff of horror movies - but these creepy killers are real!

programme.title: Wonders of the Ocean
programme.desc: Pacific islands range from coral atolls and smoking volcanoes to pieces of a lost continent. Discover wild stories of adaptation and survival.

programme.title: Wonders of the Ocean
programme.desc: Life in the ocean is a constant battle to eat but not get eaten, to find a mate, and to pass on your genes to the next generation.

programme.title: Worlds Deadliest Animals
programme.desc: From the National Geographic, this documentary series explores the deadliest animals that inhabit out planet. We travel around the globe to numerous different countries, continents and ecosystems, revealing the most dangerous animals in each location. Whether its the fearsome lions of Africa, the tyrannical tigers of India, the Amazons menacing giant anaconda, or the frightening creatures that lurk in our seas and oceans, this fascinating series with stunning cinematography takes a look at each creature in great detail, revealing how each one can be so deadly.

programme.title: Worlds Creepiest Killers
programme.desc: Giant spiders, voracious blobs and swamp things are the stuff of horror movies - but these creepy killers are real!

programme.title: Wonders of the Ocean
programme.desc: Pacific islands range from coral atolls and smoking volcanoes to pieces of a lost continent. Discover wild stories of adaptation and survival.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: This family farm needs a barn! The Pols are ready to tackle their next big project: preserving and carefully taking down a 100-year-old barn since, with every piece they remove makes the barn weaker and weaker. There is no room for error if they are going to transport these irreplaceable beams back to the farm and restore it to its former glory.

programme.title: Matt Wright ja metsik loodus
programme.desc: Matt Wright presents his show Outback Wrangler revolving around Northern Territory of Australia. Matt tracks down, captures, and transports such dangerous animals as crocodiles, that are posing a threat to people. His goal is based on the preservation of wildlife: to remove and relocate problem animals rather than kill them. Crocodiles in Northern Australia have been under protection for more than 40 years, so now they have grown quite a lot and now they have to be protected from human encounter and vice versa.

programme.title: Matt Wright ja metsik loodus
programme.desc: Matt Wright presents his show Outback Wrangler revolving around Northern Territory of Australia. Crocodiles in Northern Australia have been under protection for more than 40 years, so now they have grown quite a lot and now they have to be protected from human encounter and vice versa.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pols new livestock arent potty trained; their sheep hut isnt draining properly and has now been transformed into a Pee Palace. Its late fall and the winter deep freeze is just around the corner, so the family needs to get it fixed fast. The Pols also get a new sheep for their farm.

programme.title: The Incredible Pol Farm
programme.desc: The Pol clan gets to work on creating Beths dream garden. To beat the incoming rainstorm, an exhausted Ben works around the clock to finish building the gardens pond and waterfall. Noticing her brother is near his breaking point, Beth plans a special surprise to lift his spirits.

programme.title: Wild Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: Savage Kingdom
programme.desc: The sparse African Savannah can be a fearsome place for both herds of powerful prey and the lurking predators who hunt them down. In this captivating documentary series from National Geographic, the relationship between predator and prey is closely examined, exploring the fight for survival for both sets of animals. These herds are full of powerful or agile animals, making the job of a predator to feed itself and its family a troublesome task. But the African predators are ruthless and proficient hunters, and if a herd is infiltrated, or a straggling member is targeted, they will struggle to evade these savage carnivores.

programme.title: Wild Mongolia
programme.desc: Landlocked and bordering both China and Russia, Mongolia is a land of extreme habitats. From the challenging environment of the Gobi desert situated on a mounain plateau to the vast grasslands of the Mongolian Steppe, from the Altai mountains to the Taiga forest in the north of the country, this land is home to some of the hardiest and most resilient animals on the planet. The show explores the topography these distinct environments and chronicles how the wildlife has evolved and adapted so that they can either live with littel access to water or else become totally dependent on grass for their survival.

programme.title: Wild Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Masters of the Coast
programme.desc: The worlds coasts are home to some of the deadliest creatures on earth. From the creatures we fear to the ones we see as friends, look out for these coastal killers that bite, sting, and kill.

programme.title: Cecil
programme.sub-title: Cecil: The Legacy of A King
programme.desc: Hwanges lions are rumored to be some of the biggest wild lions on the planet. One magnificent beast was destined to become one of Africas most famous animals. He was known as Cecil. While his demise at the hand of hunters was splashed across the media, sparking fury in all who heard his tale, Cecils story before he was posthumously iconized is worthy of celebrating.
